As a mother of five, Ida has always had to be inventive. As such, she began her own business long ago selling food items out of her home. Ida is a member of the group MY GOD (1) and helps lead a group of nine other micro-entrepreneurs from Brazzaville, Republic of Congo. In order to continue to grow her business, Ida wants to take out a small loan of 200,000 CFA to expand her activities to include selling cold drinks as well. 

Ida supports not only her five children, but also her sister-in-law and several children from her husband’s previous marriage. She dreams of being able to continue adding to her activities, to expand to selling fish and eventually even open a small restaurant of her own where her clients can sit down and enjoy a meal in peace. Greeting clients with kindness and a warm welcome, Ida is excited to take out her first loan with HOPE Congo. One day she would like to be able to have enough money saved up to build a home for her family.

loans.use: to purchase drinks to sell in her food business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rice, pepper, fish, meat, onion, oil, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Ekome Feamo 2 Group

texts.en:
Diana T. is the featured borrower of the Ekome feamo 2 group. She got together with the other group members to acquire a loan from Kiva's partner, ID-Ghana, because they have always been neighbors and friends. The members' various businesses include foodstuff, plastic items, cooked food, drinks, maize, kitchen sets, toffee, saucepans and tuna fish.

Diana T. is a 51-year-old single woman with no dependent children. Six years ago, Diana started selling foodstuff (cassava, plantain) to increase her income and improve her living conditions. Diana is working hard to develop this business as much as she can to increase her business capital and attract new customers. She is now well-known in her region and she is working hard to serve many customers. 

Diana T. is acquiring a loan from Kiva's partner, ID-Ghana, to increase her business merchandise with fresh foodstuff that will develop her business. Diana is the woman standing in the middle of the picture.

loans.use: to buy and sell foodstuff (cassava, plantain)

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy yuca, potatoes, plantains, oil, etc.

loans.name: Maktabarkhon

texts.ru: Мактабархон добросовестная и целеустремленная женщина. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 4 детей. Мактабархон более 6 лет занимается переработкой и продажей косточек абрикоса. Она введет свой бизнес довольно успешно, так как работает упорно. Она покупает косточки абрикоса оптом и после переработки она продает ядро на местном рынке. Мактабархон постепенно развевает этот бизнес. Ее невестка помогает ей введению бизнеса. Мактабархон запрашивает займ на сумму 1500 сомони для покупки косточки абрикоса для увеличения оборотного капитала. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Maktabarkhon is a conscientious and goal-oriented woman. She is married and has four children. For over six years, Maktabarkhon has been processing and selling apricot pits. Her business is rather successful due to her hard work. She buys apricot pits wholesale, processes them and then sells kernels at the local market. Maktabarkhon has been developing her business gradually. Her daughter-in-law is helping her in the business. Maktabarkhon is applying for a loan in the amount of 1,500 TJS to buy apricot seeds to increase her working capital. She is counting on your kindness.

loans.use: to buy apricot pits and increase her working capital.

loans.name: Elohïm (2) Group

texts.en:
Marie is a member of the community bank group Elohïm (2) and helps lead a sub-group of four other micro-entrepreneurs in Brazzaville, the Republic of Congo. As the mother of five children who also takes care of several grandchildren, Marie has always had her hands full. To help support her family, Marie runs a small business selling a bit of everything: drinks, pots, fish and other foodstuff. 

Since joining Elohïm (2) in 2011, Marie has taken out four loans with HOPE Congo and would like to take out a fifth loan, of 800,000 Central African (CFA) franks, to continue to invest in her business. With this loan, Marie will purchase fresh fish from the river to sell as well as additional pots and pans. She cooks some of the fish herself to sell to people on the street, and the rest she sells to small local restaurants. 

In the future, Marie dreams of being able to build a home for her family.

loans.use: to purchase fresh fish from the river to sell as well as additional pots and pans

loans.name: Freedom Group

texts.en:
These women are part of the group called Freedom and Gifty is the featured borrower of this group. She got together with the other group members to acquire a loan from Kiva partner ID-Ghana because they have always been neighbors and friends. They are selling slippers, provisions, brooms, sponges, towels, and fish.

Gifty is a 42-year-old married woman with two dependent children. Twelve years ago, Gifty started selling slippers. She started selling this item to increase her income and improve her living conditions. Gifty is working hard to develop this business as much as she can, to increase her business capital, and attract new customers. For this reason, Gifty is acquiring a loan from Kiva partner ID-Ghana, to increase her business merchandise with newly-released slippers that will develop her business. She is now well-known in her region and she is working hard to participate in serving many customers. Gifty is the woman standing second from right in the picture.

Together with her friends, they will need a total amount of GHS 4,900 to increase stocks of slippers.

loans.use: to buy slippers to sell to customers so that she can increase her income and improve her living conditions.

loans.name: Sayora

texts.ru:
Сайёра женщина в возрасте 26 лет, замужем имеет одного ребенка. Она живет в сельской местности. Сайёра  с юных лет занимается животноводством.  У нее нету образования поэтому  всю свою жизнь занимается выращиванием скота. Муж у нее  подрабатывает шафером по ночам, а днем помогает своей жене, но его деньги уходят только на семейные нужды иногда даже и не хватает, поэтому выращивание скота это их основной доход. Сайёра ухаживает за скотом, а ее муж занимается купле продажей скота. Они трудятся день и ночь, чтобы дать своему ребенку образование, чтобы их ребенок не нуждался не в чем. 
Сайёра берет кредит, чтобы увеличить поголовье скота и расширить свое стадо. Она очень благодарна таким организациям как ООО МДО "АРВАНД", что с их помощью люди со средним и низким уровнем жизни могут улучшить свои условия проживания.
texts.en: Sayora is a 26-year-old woman who is married and has one child.  She lives in a rural area, and has been farming livestock since she was young.  She doesn't have any formal education, as she's had to work to support herself all her life.  Her husband earns some additional money for the family by working as a driver at night; during the day, he helps Sayora around the farm.  All the money he makes goes towards their living expenses, and as it's sometimes not enough to pay for everything, they depend on livestock as their main source of income.  Sayora takes care of their animals, while her husband buys and sells them.  They work day and night so that their son lacks for nothing, including education.  She is seeking a loan to add more cattle to her farm, and is very thankful for organizations like Arvand, which give people of modest means the opportunity to improve their quality of life.

loans.use: buy cattle

loans.name: Sherzod

texts.ru:
Шерзод мужчина в возрасте 27 лет, женат и  имеет 2 детей.  Шерзод живет в сельской местности и его основным источником дохода является услуги грузоперевозки. Шерзод работает на своей машине целый день и его машина это его хлеб и этим он зарабатывает на жизнь. Жена Шерзода работает на поле и помогает мужу в содержании семьи. Семья у Шерзода бедная и помощи ждать не у кого.
 Шерзод обратился в организацию  Арванд за финансовой помощью, чтобы починить свою машину так как его грузовик требует ремонта. Он планирует купить запчасти для своего авто. Он заранее благодарен таким финансовым организациям как ООО МДО "АРВАНД" за поддержку населения с низким уровнем жизни.
texts.en:
Sherzod is 27 and married with two children. He lives in a rural area and provides transportation services as his main source of income. He works in his vehicle all day - he depends on it and earns a living from it. Sherzod's wife works in the fields and helps her husband care for the family. His family is poor and there is no one to expect help from.

Sherzod has turned to Arvand for financial help in order to repair his vehicle as it needs work. He intends to buy auto parts. He thanks financial organizations such as Arvand in advance for their support of populations with a low standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase auto parts

loans.name: Soro

texts.ru: Соро как ответственная женщина, начала свой бизнес несколько лет назад для того, чтобы обеспечить своих детей со всеми необходимыми средствами. Соро занимается переработкой и продажей сухофруктов. Соро владеет садом, где растут абрикосовые деревья. Она каждый сезон собирает урожай, а также покупает еще абрикосы, перерабатывает, сушит и продает на местном рынке. Она этим бизнесом уже занимается несколько лет и имеет своих постоянных покупателей. Соро хочет в этом сезоне увеличить оборотный капитал и купить больше абрикосов. Скоро начнется новый сезон и поэтому она запрашивает займ на сумму 6000 Сомони для покупки ящиков и других средств для переработки абрикоса. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Soro, as a responsible woman, launched her business a few years ago in order to provide for her children. Soro processes and sells dried fruits.  She owns an apricot orchard. Every season Soro harvests apricots and also buys them from other farmers; then she processes, dries and sells the fruits at the local market. She has been in this business for several years and has her steady customer following. This season, Soro would like to increase her working capital and buy more apricots. The new season is about to start,  which is why she is applying for a loan of 6,000 TJS to buy boxes and other accessories for processing apricots. She is counting on your kindness.

loans.use: To buy boxes and etc. for business

loans.name: Bahriniso

texts.ru:
Бахринисо жительница предгорного района А.Джоми. Ей 48 лет. Она истинный скотовод, которая на протяжении более 20 лет своей жизни занимается разведением коров и быков. Бахринисо разведена. Она сама поставила на ноги своих детей. У нее трое сыновей в возрасте 12, 17 и 28 лет. Старший сын вместе с нею занимается скотоводством, второй сын находится в России, третий сын учится в школе. Ее сыновья для нее являются опорой и поддержкой. Она очень любит их и хорошо воспитала.
В данный момент во дворе Бахринисо осталось считанное количество скотов. Она хочет увеличить их поголовье и в связи с этим обратилась за кредитом, чтобы приобрести несколько голов коров и быков. Она надеется, что кредиторы Kiva поддержат ее.
texts.en:
Bahriniso is 48 and a resident of the foothills of the A. Jomi region. She is a true herder who for more than 20 years of her life has been raising cows and steers. Bahriniso is divorced and is bringing up her children by herself. She has three sons aged 12, 17 and 28. The oldest works with her in animal husbandry, the second is in Russia and the third son is in school. Her sons are her support. She loves them very much and has raised them well.

At the moment, Bahriniso has very few cattle left in her yard. She wants to increase her head count and therefore is looking for a loan to buy some cows and steers.She hopes that Kiva lenders will support her.

loans.use: to buy cows and steers to develop her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more dried fish for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more fish, rice, palm oil and cooking seasonings to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more clothing material for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more blood nutrient syrup, malarial drugs, and pain tablets to expand her business.

loans.name: Truth Group

texts.en:
Mawuko is the featured borrower of the Truth Group. She got along with the other group members, holding hands together and acquiring a loan from Kiva partner ID-Ghana so they can fulfill their needs.

Mawuko is a 44-year-old married mother of one dependent child. Ten years ago, she started working from one house to another, selling jewelry, clothes, and cosmetics to support her family and child's education. Her incomes isn't enough to cover her family's increasing needs. For this reason, her requested loan will be invested in buying new jewelry, clothes, and cosmetics that will attract her customers’ attention and increase her income. Mawuko hopes to expand her business in the future and move to a bigger shop. The other group members are Diana and Awenpo. They will hold one another accountable for the repayment of the total loan amount of GHS 4,400.

Mawuko is standing in the middle of the picture.

loans.use: to buy newly jewelry, clothes, and cosmetics that will attract her customers’ attention and increase her income.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Doña Rosa es una clienta con 39 años de edad, soltera y madre de dos hijos. Actualmente vive con un hijo menor y es jefa de hogar. Desde hace varios años se dedica a su actividad de costuras, debido a que cuenta con el conocimiento necesario para prestar los servicios a su comunidad. Se dedica a coser a la medida, hacer arreglos a diferentes prendas de vestir, confecciona ropa, cortinas y otros, también cuenta con un contrato de hacer cortinas y fundas para una bananera. Se dedica bastante tiempo a su negocio sin descuidar a su familia, y en temporadas altas beneficia a otras personas dándoles trabajo. Su deseo es superarse y crecer en su negocio, ya que busca en otras empresas contratos para confeccionar uniformes, asi mejorar las condiciones de vida de ella y la de su familia.
texts.en:
The client, Rosa, is 39 years old and single, and is the mother of two children.  Currently she lives with a younger son and is the head of her household.

She has earned a living in sewing for several years because she has the knowledge needed to offer services to her community.  She sews to order, mends a variety of garments, and makes clothing, curtains, and other items.  She also has a contract to make curtains and covers for a banana company.  She devotes a lot of time to her business without neglecting her family, and during the busy season she benefits other people by giving them work.

Rosa wants to improve herself and grow in her business, because she's looking for contracts with other companies to make uniforms.  That way she'll improve living conditions for herself and her family.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy palm oil in bulk (by the gallon).

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase dry meat and rubber dishes (bowls, plates, cups, etc.) for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rubber dishes (bowls, buckets, cups, etc.) for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more blood syrup, malarial drugs and pain tablets to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase additional slippers, blouses, body cream, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Noong Luong 7 Group

texts.en:
Hoa is 26 years old and lives in a small house with her husband and her 7-year-old daughter. She has been elected to be the team leader of Noong Luong 7 Group, which consists of seven Thai ladies. Her family's earnings mainly rely on agriculture activities, such as cultivating rice, growing bananas, raising chickens, ducks and fish. To have further income to cover better living expenses and pay tuition fees for their daughter, her husband works extra for local construction employers. 

Hoa also wants to expand her business, so she has taken a loan from Anh Chi Em, and this time, she will use the loan to buy small fish. This is the third time Hoa has had a loan with Anh Chi Em. Recently, she has faced some difficulties, such as lacking money to buy food for fish or buy fertilizer for the rice field; supplies are high-priced while her products are low-priced. Therefore, she hopes that by using the loan and the knowledge from Anh Chi Em's training lessons relating to agriculture and spending management, she could gradually improve the income for her family and her daughter will be more adequate in life.

In the picture, Hoa stands first from the right with a red T-shirt.

loans.use: to buy small fish.

loans.name: Muslima

texts.ru:
Муслима замужняя женщина в возрасте 52 лет. Она живет в районе А.Джоми вместе с мужем, двумя сыновьями, невесткой и внуком. Муслима и ее муж являются дехканами. В течение 10 лет их семья занимается выращиванием сельскохозяйственных культур. Муслима научилась технике выращивания сельхоз культур у своего мужа. Ей доставляет наслаждение работать на земле и наблюдать за плодом своих трудов. 
Муслима трудолюбивая женщина. Она и ее муж сейчас готовятся к очередному посеву. Для того, чтобы провести посев им необходимо закупить семена и минеральные удобрения, на это они просят кредит. В будущем она хочет расширить земельный участок и увеличить посев урожая.
texts.en:
Muslima is a married 52-year old woman. She lives in the A. Jomi area together with her husband, two children, daughter-in-law and a grandson. Muslima and her husband are farmers. For ten years, their family has been growing farm produce. Muslima learned how to go grow farm produce from her husband. She enjoys working the land and seeing the results of her work.
Muslima is a hard-working woman. She and her husband are currently preparing for a planting season. In order to do this, they need to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers, which is why they are applying for a loan. In the future she would like to expand her land plot and increase her harvest.

loans.use: to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers for the planting season.

loans.name: Maria Del Socorro

texts.en:
Maria Del Socorro is 56 years old. She is single and has two grown up independent sons. She lives with her father.

Socorro opened a food stall eight years ago. In the beginning she sold snacks, but now she sells mostly chicken wings, french fries and desserts. To earn additional income, she sells shoes by catalog.

She is asking for a loan to prepare her food stall for the rainy season. She wants to acquire a plastic canvas, a large table and some chairs to protect her clients from the rain. She will also use part of the loan to buy some shoes and resell them to her current clients.

Socorro is proud of having achieved some financial stability for her children, having a house and being able to occasionally go on vacations.

loans.use: to buy a plastic canvas and some chairs for her food stall.

loans.name: Rahima

texts.ru: Эту умелую мастерицу зовут Рахима. Ей 43 года. Она из района Гиссар. Рахима работает в столице. Ее ателье расположено на одном из рынке города Душанбе. Рахима замужем, имеет двух сыновей и дочь. Она обеспечивает семью за счет своего швейного бизнеса. Рахима по заказу шьет женские национальные платья. Ее услуги всегда востребованы. Рахима просит кредит, чтобы расширить деятельность. Она хочет купить новую швейную машинку, с помощью которой процесс ее работы ускорится. Она планирует увеличить количество заказов и таким образом увеличить доходность своего дела.
texts.en: This skilled seamstress is called Rahima. She is from the Gissar region. She works in the capital city. Her shop is located at one of the markets of the city of Dushanbe. Rahima is married and has two sons and one daughter. She provides for her family thanks to her sewing business. She takes orders for traditional women's clothing. Her services are always in demand. Rahima is applying for a loan in order to expand her business. She would like to buy a new sewing machine, thanks to which she will speed up her work. She plans to expand the number of orders she takes and thus increase the revenues from her business.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine so as to grow her business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy corn, rice and condiments.

loans.name: Maria Gloria

texts.en:
Maria Gloria is a 65-year-old widow. She has three grownup sons and some grandsons. She has owned a clothing store inside of a Mexico City market for over twenty years.

She sells clothes for women, men and children and has a variety of products. Thanks to this business, Maria has been able to provide financial stability for her family and help her sons become independent, despite the death of her husband. 

Maria Gloria is asking for a loan to buy some clothes and offer more variety to her recurring clients.

loans.use: to buy clothes for her store.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy boxes of soap, cookies and canned food.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to pay for his son’s education.

loans.name: Bas Nere De Yaoghin Group

texts.fr:
Mr OUSMANE représente le groupe  BAS NERE DE YAOGHIN. Marié, il est père de 01enfant. Il est âgé de 09mois.
Mr collecte et vend les objets recyclable depuis 09ans. Il s’approvisionne dans son secteur. 
Mr veut s’acheter 20batteries usés, 50chaises usés, du fer etc.
Avec  ses bénéfices, il veut renforcer son activité. Mr ambitionne ouvrir un grand magasin d’objets usés.
texts.en:
Mr. Ousmane represents the Bas Nere De Yaoghin group. He is married and the father of a nine month old. 

For nine years, he has been collecting and selling recyclable objects. He gets his supplies in his neighborhood. He would like to buy 20 used batteries, iron, etc. 

With his profits, he would like to strengthen his business. He would like to open a large store for used objects.

loans.use: to buy 20 used batteries, 50 used chairs, iron, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase an air conditioner and renovate his workplace.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase stationery and copying supplies and to renovate his workplace.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to cover vehicle maintenance.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a sewing machine, an embroidery machine, fabric and an iron.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy an air conditioner, an overlock sewing machine and fabric.

loans.name: Noong Luong 8 Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Anh is a 25-year-old Thai lady who lives in a small traditional Thai house with five family members, including her parents-in-law, her husband, and her two children. Anh and her husband have had to work very hard to provide for their big family. Their parents are old and weak; their daughter attends kindergarten and their son is in grade 2. 

To cover all living expenses, Anh's husband works for a local construction employer while she works in agriculture production and constantly expands her farming activities. Specifically, Anh raises fish, chicken, and pigs and cultivates rice and cassava. 

Anh said that she has benefited a lot since she joined the Anh Chi Em Program. Indeed, she has earned a high profit from using the loan from Anh Chi Em and has gained plenty of knowledge on agriculture and hygiene from the program's training. Hence, Anh decided to continue taking out loans from Anh Chi Em. This is her fourth loan, which she will use to buy piglets. 

She hopes that her family's income will be improved significantly and her children will have a better education and a better future than she has. 

In the picture, Anh is holding a paper and stands on the right.

loans.use: to buy piglets

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more grocery products and a refrigerator.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy miscellaneous items (canned food, soap, pasta etc).

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay her son school fees uniform, books and other school expenses

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine, table and iron.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to renovate his workplace, buy refrigerator, and buy more grocery products

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for her son's school fees, uniform, books

loans.name: Adama's Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe a été crée le 24 décembre 2010 à l'inauguration de son banc villageois. Il est composé de membres ayant une bonne cohésion sociale et exerçant toutes le petit commerce comme activité.

Debout à droite de la photo, et levant la main, la vedette Saye est âgée de 64 ans. Elle est mariée et mère 10 enfants dont 04 filles( avec 02 qui sont mariées). 

Avec son pr^t reçu, elle achète des graines d'arachides pour transformer en huile et rakal. Ainsi elle achète le kg à 500 frs à Ndangalma village abritant un marché hebdomadaire ou à Bambey Séreres. Elle dispose de machine pour la transformation et obtient avec les 200 kgs 80 litres d'huile et 45 kgs de rakal. Elle revend le litre à 1 000frs et le kg de rakal à 350 frs. 

Les bénéfices générés par l'activité lui permettent de renforcer ses épargnes, payer ses intérêts et améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille par l'achat d'habits pour ses enfants et petits fils ainsi que l'amélioration de la qualité de la nourriture.
texts.en:
This group has been created on December 24, 2010, at the launch of the local banc villageois. Its members form a close-knit community. They all work as vendors.

Our star borrower, Saye, the one standing on the right raising her hand in the photo, is 64 years old. She is married and has ten children, four of whom are daughters (two of them are already married). With her loan she will buy peanuts to process them into oil and "rakal" [animal fodder]. She will buy peanuts at 500 West African francs per kg [2.2 lbs] in Ndangalma, a village hosting a weekly market, or in Bambey Séreres. She owns equipment for processing peanuts and obtains 80 liters [21 gal] of oil and 45 kg [99 lbs] of "rakal" from 200 kg [440 lbs] of peanuts. She resells oil for 1,000 francs per liter and rakal for 350 francs per kg. The revenues from her business will allow her to grow her savings, pay off her interest and improve the life conditions of her family by buying clothing for her children and grandchildren, as well as by improving her family's nutrition.

loans.use: to buy peanuts for processing into peanut oil and animal fodder.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his children's school fees and other study expenses

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his children's school fees and other study expenses

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for her son's education.

loans.name: Gulbahor

texts.ru: Гулбахор старается улучшить условия жизни и стимулировать экономическое состояние семьи. Она не замужем и живет с родителями. Ее родители имеют маленький доход и поэтому они живут бедно. Гулбахор хочет организовать свой бизнес и таким образом помочь родителям. С такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Теперь она вполне может организовать свой бизнес и стать успешной в этой сфере. Она хочет организовать бизнес шитьем женской одежды, так как имеет опыт вышиванию женской одежды. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1000 сомони для покупки швейной машинки, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Gulbahor is trying her best to improve her living conditions and bolster her family's finances.  She is unmarried and lives with her parents.  Her parents don't make very much money, and live rather poorly as a result.  As such, Gulbahor decided to sign up for a course organized by a local businesswomen's association titled "Achieve Success"; she received a certificate upon completion, and feels she is ready to start her own business and become a successful entrepreneur.  Gulbahor would like to start her own business as a seamstress as she has experience in making women's clothing, and is seeking a loan of 1,000 somoni to buy a new sewing machine.  She is counting on your kindness.

loans.use: buy a sewing machine to start a new business

loans.name: Rigoberto

texts.es: Rigoberto de 52 años de edad vive junto a su familia en casa propia, el se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y eso le  ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, cuando su cosecha y esta lista sale  a comercializarlos a los diferentes mercados, ya tiene mucha clientela que lo prefieren por la calidad, los buenos precios y sobre todo por el buen servicio; el necesita invertir por eso le solicita un crédito que le permita comprar semillas, insecticida, fertilizantes, abonos, herbicida, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía,  Rigoberto  tiene buenas referencias por parte de sus conocidos, y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda en el periodo establecido y a la vez confía que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: Rigoberto, who is 52 years old, lives with his family in his own house. He grows corn and beans. He has worked in agriculture for a number of years, and this has given him a lot of experience, which allows him to obtain the best harvests. When his harvest is ready, he goes to sell his products in various markets, since he has many customers who prefer him for the quality, the good prices, and above all for his good service. He needs to invest, and so he is applying for a loan that will allow him to buy seeds, insecticides, fertilizers, compost, herbicide, etc., and to improve the land, which is shown in the photograph. Rigoberto has good references from people who know him, and he is very responsible. He confirms that he will be able to pay off the debt in the agreed-upon period, and at the same time he is confident that he will bring economic security to his household.

loans.use: to buy seeds, insecticides, fertilizers, compost, herbicides, etc., and to improve the land

loans.name: Ligaya

texts.en:
At the age of 60, Ligaya still has the eagerness to manage her business. With her standard of living, in terms of financial matters, her children's remittances for her are enough to sustain their needs. But because of her desire to help others, she enjoys managing her restaurant business. To employ her neighbors and relatives in her restaurant business is a simple way to help them. 

Ligaya wants to expand her business to help more people by giving them a chance to have work as their source of living. Ligaya wishes for a loan of 30,000 PHP to buy raw meats and other ingredients to cook for the daily menu and sell. She will also use the loan to buy more utensils for her catering service business. Ligaya believes that by borrowing the loan, she will expand her business and at the same time employ others.

loans.use: to buy raw meats and other ingredients to cook for the daily menu and sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase pest controls, fertilizer, compost, seeds and other items necessary for planting and for improving the soil

loans.name: Cristobal De Jesus

texts.es: Cristóbal de 31 años de edad se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años y eso le ha dado la capacidad y el conocimiento necesario para asistir sus cultivos, su principal siembra es el maíz y el frijol, comercializa sus cultivos en agencias de compra-venta de granos básicos que están cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar los gastos que su familia tiene, vive en casa propia con su esposa, el está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar insumos agrícolas que le ayuden en la siembra de sus cultivos como: abonos, semillas, fertilizantes, y mejorar el terreno que es el que muestra la fotografía y asi poder tener mejores ganancias y tener una mejor vida junto con su esposa sin ninguna limitación.
texts.en:
31 year old Cristobal has worked in agriculture for many years and this has given him the capacity and the knowledge necessary to tend his crops. His main crops are corn and beans. He sells his crops in basic grain trade agencies that are close to his place of residence, and with the profits from his sales is able to cover his family's costs. He lives in his own house with his wife. 

He is requesting a loan to purchase agricultural inputs that will assist in the sowing of his crops, like: manure, seeds, fertilisers, and to improve the field, which is shown in the photograph, thereby allowing for better profits and a better life with his wife, without any limitation.

loans.use: to buy manure, seeds, fertilisers, and improve the field

loans.name: Elisabeth

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal TRABAJADORAS DE HABASPATA, el banco está ubicado en la provincia de La Convención, distrito de Vilcabamba y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Elizabeth  tiene 32 años de edad, viuda y tiene 01 hijo, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose a su negocio de multiservicios como venta de gas, fotocopiadora, entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose  a este trabajo  el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su trabajo, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de papales entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
This communal bank member belongs to the communal bank "Trabajadoras de Habaspata" (Workers of Habaspata). The bank is located in the La Convención province, in the district of Vilcabamba and the department of Cusco.

Bank member Elisabeth is 32 years old. She is a widow and has one son. She alternates her daily activities, working at her business of multiservices, such as selling gas and photocopying, among others. She has been doing this work for some time, and it is going well for her thanks to the effort that she puts into her work every day. She is a responsible and tenacious person, since it is in this way that she is raising her family.

She is applying for the loan to purchase paper, among other items.

She is grateful for the loan offered to her, and she promises to make the established payments.

loans.use: to buy paper, among other items.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.en:
Maribel worked abroad for 16 years. When she come back to the Philippines, Maribel decided to put up her sari-sari store business. She has been managing her retail business for four years now. Maribel's greatest wish is just to have the good health to continue operating the business for the growth of it. 

Maribel wanted to borrow a loan of 15,000 PHP to buy grocery items and drinks to sell. She hopes that her business will last so that she can have a lifetime source of income and be able to continue supporting her relatives, even in a simple way.

loans.use: to buy grocery items and drinks to sell.

loans.name: Violenda

texts.en:
Violenda is 52 years old and married with seven children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a 17,000 PHP loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF) in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Violenda has borrowed and repaid eight loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for twenty years and also earns an income from e-loading (prepaid mobile phone loads). Violenda aspires to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his son's education.

loans.name: Jodeline

texts.en:
As the married mother of three children, Jodeline works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from pig fattening. Jodeline is borrowing PHP 19,000 through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her food business.

Jodeline has been sustaining her business activities through her past nine loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food business.

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha is 57 years old and married with four children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Editha has borrowed and repaid twenty loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 15 years and also earns an income from raising livestock. Editha aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Amardelger

texts.en:
Amardelger, 40 years old, lives with her two children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. 

She has been running a taxi service for local people since 2011. Thanks to her previous loan, she now owns her own land and has built a traditional Mongolian ger (a portable felt dwelling). 

Now she is requesting a loan of 1,000,000 MNT to buy spare parts for her car. Her car has deteriorated over the years and needs repair. After this, she will be able to continue to operate her taxi service for a living.

loans.use: to repair her car

loans.name: Sehila

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal TRABAJADORAS DE HABASPATA, el banco está ubicado en la provincia de La Convención, distrito de Vilcabamba y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Sehila tiene 42 años de edad, viuda y tiene 02 hijos, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose a su negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende diferentes tipos de productos como arroz, azúcar entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose  a este trabajo  el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su trabajo, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de arroz entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
This communal bank member belongs to the communal bank "Trabajadoras de Habaspata" (Workers of Habaspata). The bank is located in the province of La Convención, in the district of Vilcabamba and the department of Cusco.

Bank member Sehila is 42 years old. She is a widow and has two children. She alternates her daily activities, working in her grocery store business. She sells different types of products, such as rice and sugar, among other items. She has done this work for quite some time, and it is going well for her thanks to the effort that she puts into her work every day. She is a responsible and hard-working person, since this is how she is raising her family.

She is applying for the loan to purchase rice, among other items.

She is grateful for the loan offered, and she promises to make the established payments.

loans.use: to buy rice, among other items.

loans.name: Arleen

texts.en:
Arleen is 39 years old and married with ten children. She earns a living by farming bananas in the Philippines. Arleen is borrowing 16,000 PHP through NWTF in order to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Arleen has been farming bananas for eight years and also earns additional income from pig fattening. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Otgon

texts.en:
Otgon, 49 years old, lives with his wife and two sons in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been running a taxi service for local people since 2009 and during his day off, he usually makes and sells frames for additional income. 

His eldest son wants to study at university in Russia in order to advance his career, so Otgon is requesting a loan of 1,500,000 MNT to pay for his son's tuition fees. He thinks investment in education is the best thing one can do for the next generation. 

The borrower is a very hardworking individual who is striving for a better future.

loans.use: to pay tuition fees

loans.name: Tomasa

texts.es: Tomasa tiene 54 años de edad y habita en casa propia y muy humilde junto a su compañero de vida y su hija de 13 años y su hijo de 15 años de edad. Tomasa es una mujer comprometida con su familia, ella hace todo lo que este en sus manos para apoyar en la economía del hogar. Con el fin de mejoras sus condiciones de vida solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos dado que desea reparar el techo de la vivienda el cual se encuentra deteriorado. Espera poder tener accesos a este financiamiento y así dar inicio a la mejora lo antes posible.
texts.en: Tomasa, 54, lives in her own humble home with her husband and children, ages 13 and 15.  Tomasa is committed to her family and does everything she can to support the household economy.  In an effort to improve her living conditions she has requested a loan through FUSAI to buy metal sheeting, wood and nails to repair the roof of her house which is in disrepair.  She hopes to receive the loan so she can begin renovation as soon as possible.

loans.use: To buy metal sheeting, wood and nails to repair the roof of her house.

loans.name: Oyuntuya

texts.en:
Oyuntuya, 47 years old, lives with her husband and son in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. She has been selling automobile spare parts to local people since 2011. Her husband and son used to work in Korea on an employment contract. 

She is requesting a loan of 2,000,000 MNT to buy vacuum insulated windows, hardwood floors and fiberglass for house renovation. After installing vacuum windows and hardwood floors, and insulating with fiberglass, her family will live in a comfortable and warm place where less coal is used for heating so fewer pollutants are released into the air.

loans.use: to install vacuum insulated windows and hardwood floors

loans.name: Yudith

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LOS CUMPLIDITOS DE RIOBAMBA, el banco está ubicado en la provincia de Calca, distrito de Yanatile  y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Yudith tiene 27 años de edad, es soltera y tiene 01 hijo, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose al negocio de cultivo de frutas como plátanos entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose  a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de abono  y otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The borrower is a member of the LOS CUMPLIDITOS DE RIOBAMBA communal bank which is located in the province of Calca, district of Yanatile in the department of Cusco.

Yudith, 27, is single and has a son.  She alternates her daily activities with her business growing fruit, such as bananas.  She has been in this line of work for several years and it is going well for her thanks to the hard work she puts into it every day.  She is a responsible, dedicated person who earns a living this way to support her family.

The loan this member is requesting is to buy compost and other supplies.  She is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy compost and other supplies.

loans.name: Virgen De Las Nieves Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “VIRGEN DE LAS NIEVES”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Carlota ella es conviviente y tiene 34 años y tiene 3 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de artesanía, la socia realiza trabajos de arcilla, la socia hace tazas, platos y adornos de arcilla, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 5 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de artesanía. La socia solicita el crédito para arcilla y temperas.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de costurera, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de artesanía.
 
 


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the "VIRGEN DE LAS NIEVES" communal bank which is located in the district, province and department of Cusco.

One of the members is Carlota who is 34 years old and has three children.  She has a business selling crafts.  She makes clay cups, plates and decorative items.  Her work schedule is from 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. and she has been in business for five years,  It is going very well for her and her goal is to expand her craft selling business.  The loan she is requesting is to buy clay and paints.

The other members are involved in businesses such as clothing sales, sewing, grocery store and crafts.

The member is grateful to those who are taking part in her dream through the loan; and she is committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy clay and paints.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy cleaning products for resale.

loans.name: Florina

texts.en: Florina, 54 years of age, is married to a farm laborer and blessed with one child. She has managed a hog raising business for almost five years and earns a net income of PHP 5,000 per hog. Her net income is usually spent on their food expenses and the rest is for emergency purposes. Due to insufficient funds she would like to avail herself of a loan amounting to PHP 10,000 to purchase hog feed and hogs to raise. She's hoping that her loan request will be granted so that she will be able to improve her business more.

loans.use: to purchase hog feed and hogs to raise.

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
Marites is a 46-year-old married woman. For the past eight years, she has been selling cosmetics (using a catalog) with her husband, using their own motorcycle as shown in the photo.

She purchases cosmetics in bulk from the wholesale market and then sells them in the neighboring villages to her friends and relatives. She has become famous by providing good quality cosmetics in her locality and earns enough to have a decent life.

She is a responsible mother of five children and needs to earn more to bear the daily expenditures of her family members. For this reason, she requested a loan to buy more cosmetic products in large quantities.

She is in her fifth loan cycle and has shown good repayment behavior. She wishes to utilize her earned profit on her children’s education and well-being.

loans.use: to buy more cosmetic products in large quantities.

loans.name: María

texts.es: Doña María es una clienta de 45 años de edad, casada y madre de cuatro hijos. Vive con su esposo y tres hijos, de los cuales solamente uno es menor de edad. Ella tiene trayectoria en la Fundación. Es trabajadora y dedicada a su familia. Vive en una finca en donde tiene el ganado y otros animales. Su actividad principal es el ordeño de las vacas para la venta de la leche. Tiene el apoyo de una hija para la actividad y su esposo le ayuda en los tiempos libres de él, debido a que es asalariado. Tiene solo un comprador de la leche, debido a que necesita más materia prima para satisfacer a sus clientes. Su meta es lograr aumentar la cantidad de cabezas de ganado lechero para crecer, superarse y vivir del mismo negocio, hacer una empresa grande familiar y asi buscar nuevos clientes y mejorar la calidad de vida de ella y la de su familia. Ahora necesita reforzar su negocio comprando más cabezas de ganado y hacer un biodigestor para ayudar al medio ambiente.
texts.en:
Maria is 45, married, and the mother to four children.  She lives with her husband and three children, only one of whom is a minor.  She has experience in the Fundación organization.  She is a hard worker and dedicated to her family.  

Maria lives on a farm where she raises cattle and other animals.  Her main work is milking the cows to sell the milk.  Her daughter helps her with this work and her husband helps when he has free time from his paid job.  She has only one buyer of the milk, because she needs more raw material to satisfy her clients.  

Her goal is to increase the number of cattle in her dairy in order to grow, overcome, and make a living with her business; to have a large family company and through that find new clients and improve the quality of life for her and her family.  Now Maria needs to strengthen her business by purchasing more cattle and making a biodigestor to help the environment.

loans.use: to purchase a bull and a heifer.

loans.name: Mary Grace

texts.en:
Mary Grace is 42 years old and a married mother of five children, one of whom is in school.

Mary Grace is in the agricultural business, farming banana in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies. She has been farming banana for five years now, and has borrowed 19 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Mary Grace would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es: Doña Ana es una clienta con trayectoria en la Fundación. Tiene cuarenta y dos años, vive con su único hijo y con su compañero. Siempre se ha dedicado a las costuras. Ella tiene gran experiencia en corte y confección de prendas tales como cortinas, set de baños, sábanas, pijamas y costuras a la medida. Llevó varios cursos en el Instituto Nacional de Aprendizaje. En su casa tiene un cuarto acondicionado como taller de costura. Tiene varias máquinas de coser, de las cuales les da buena calidad de acabado a sus prendas y asi satisface a sus clientes y gana aún más clientes por recomendación de los mismos. Cuenta con contratos para dos tiendas de la comunidad limonense, a las que les confecciona y vende los set de baños y sábanas. Necesita inyección de capital para comprar materia prima y poder terminar un pedido que tiene que entregar. Su meta es superarse y crecer en su actividad.
texts.en: Doña Ana is a client with a track record at the foundation. She is 42 years old. She lives with her only son and with her companion. She has always worked in sewing. She has a lot of experience in sewing articles such as curtains, bath sets, sheets, pajamas, and tailor-made items. She took a number of courses at the National Training Institute. In her house she has a room set up as a sewing workshop. She has various sewing machines, which give good finishing quality to her products and thus satisfy her customers and win her even more customers from their recommendations. She has contracts with two stores in the community of Limón, for whom she makes and sells bath sets and sheets. She needs an injection of capital to buy basic supplies and to be able to finish an order that she needs to deliver. Her goal is to better herself and to grow in her business.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: Lilian

texts.es: Doña Lilian es una mujer con 42 años de edad, casada y madre de dos hijos. Ella vive con su esposo, y un hijo menor, el cual cursa el quinto año del colegio. Es humilde, trabajadora y tiene visión empresarial. Su negocio se llama Digicentro MyL, ahí prestan los servicios de fotocopiado, levantados de textos, impresiones, se toman fotografías, también vende artículos escolares y de oficina. Tiene aproximadamente ocho años de experiencia y gracias a la buena administración le va muy bien. En ocasiones cuenta con contratos de algunas escuelas y colegios, además de empresas de la misma comunidad. El préstamo lo va invertir en comprar materia prima y equipo para satisfacer con mayor facilidad a sus clientes. En sus créditos anteriores ha mostrado responsabilidad y puntualidad.
texts.en: Lilian is 42 years old, married, and the mother of two. She lives with her husband and her minor son who is in fifth grade. Lilian is a hardworking woman with an entrepreneurial vision. Her business is called “Digicentro MyL,” where she provides photocopy services, transcription, printing, photographs, and also sells school and office supplies. She’s been doing this for approximately eight years and things have been going well thanks to her good management. Sometimes she gets some special contracts from schools, friends, or other companies in the community. She will use the money from this loan to buy supplies and equipment to better satisfy her customers.  She has been responsible with her previous loans and paid them back on time.

loans.use: to buy printing supplies.

loans.name: Khom

texts.en:
Khom lives in the Borey Chulsa district of Takeo province. She is 55 years old, married and has a 14-year-old daughter who attends school. Her family living depends on her paddy rice farm, and her husband also works as a paid worker to earn additional income for the family.

She has completed 2 loans with VisionFund which have helped her to improve her standard of  living. She is now requesting her third loan from VisionFund to cover expenses on her paddy rice farm such as fertilizer and seed purchases. She hopes that the income will help her to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilzer and seed

loans.name: Jenelyn

texts.en: Jenelyn, 38 years of age, is married to a farmer and blessed with four children. She has managed a hog raising business for almost four years and earns a net income of PHP 2,000 per hog. Her net income on her business is usually spent on the agricultural needs for additional income. Due to insufficient funds she would like to avail herself of a loan amounting to PHP 20,000 to purchase hog feed to supply her hogs. She's hoping that her business will continue to grow and become more profitable.

loans.use: to purchase hog feed to supply her hogs.

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
Norma has been helping her husband to manage their own farm for 18 years, earning well for the family. She also serves in their community as a public official, for which she earns extra income to help with their living expenses. She has saved some money from this to be used for renovating their house, but it still doesn't cover all the costs.

Her previous loan which she used for farming was successfully repaid, and recently she has taken out a new loan to help finance her house renovation.

Norma is hoping to yield higher returns from her farm in the future, and she wants to sustain and improve it for a stable source of income in the coming years.

loans.use: to finance her house renovation

loans.name: Ret

texts.en:
Ret lives in the Kiri Vong district of Takeo province. She is now 33 years old, married and has three children. Two of her children attend school while the youngest is only three years old. She and her husband have been working in their paddy rice field in order to support the family living. They can earn 33,000 KHR on average per day.

She has completed four loans with VisionFund already and was able to see very good impacts from the previous loan. She is now requesting her fifth loan from VisionFund to purchase fertilizer and seeds. The income will be used to cover the expenses for her child's education and the family's food and health care.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and seeds

loans.name: Sarith

texts.en:
Sarith lives in the Borey Chulsa district of Takeo province. He is 29 years old, married and has a 4-year-old son. He and his family depend on their rice farm and sometimes they work for others for a fee. He can earn 26,000 KHR on average per month.

He is now requesting his first loan with VisionFund to cover the expenses on his rice field such as purchasing fertilizer and seed. The income will be used to buy more fertilizer and the family's food.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seed for his paddy rice farm

loans.name: Song

texts.en:
Song lives in the Borey Chulsa district of Takeo province. He is 53 years old, married and has a dependent child. In order to support his family, he has been cultivating a rice field for 24 years. He can earn about 35,000 KHR per day.

He is now requesting his first loan with VisionFund to cover the expenses on his rice field such as fertilizer and seed purchases. The income will be used to expand the business, and to pay for his family's food and education.

loans.use: to buy fertilzer and seed for his rice field

loans.name: Marlene

texts.es: Marlene una madre de 39 años de edad madre de 4 hijos dos mayores de edad, y otros dos que no superan los 10 años, pero los 4 depende de ella vive en una unión libre con una persona que le ayuda con los gastos del hogar pero como es una madre muy preocupada y ha sabido que es vivir en pobreza lucha incansablemente para darles un futuro a sus hijos que ellos puedan tener lo que ella no pudo como una educación, unos servicios una familia que los ame, actualmente tiene una tienda donde distribuye abarrotes y variedades, actividad que aprendió empíricamente y que ejerció ante la dificultad de conseguir un trabajo en Colombia y con la cual ha criado y mantenido a sus hijos, solicita un crédito para la adecuación de su local pues como es una persona con ingresos humildes no ha podido modificar y adecuar su local a su gusto con la ayuda de este crédito lo puede lograr y no solo eso puede surtirlo con abarrotes como huevos, arroz, panela, con trigo lo que le supondría un aumento de ventas con las cuales iniciara un proyecto de montar una segunda tienda para poner a trabajar a uno de sus hijos y que juntos puedan progresar por el bien de la familia
texts.en:
Marlene, 39, is the mother of four children, two adults and two under the aqe of ten, who all depend on her.  She lives with her partner and they share the responsibility for the household expenses.  She is a concerned mother who knows what it is like to live in poverty, working tirelessly to give her children a future so they can attain what she did not have such as an education, basic utilities and a family that loves them.  

Marlene currently runs a grocery store where she sells groceries and a variety of other items.  She learned the trade on her own and the business because of the difficulty to get work in Colombia.  She has been able to raise and support her children. 

The loan she is requesting is to renovate her store, since she has not been able to do so because of her limited income.  The loan will help with the project and also allow her to stock the store with groceries such as eggs, rice, brown sugar, and wheat so she can increase sales.  Her aim is to start a new project and open a second store where one of her children can work so they can prosper together for the family's well-being.

loans.use: To renovate her store and stock it with groceries such as rice, brown sugar, chocolate, eggs and bread.

loans.name: Yan

texts.en:
Yan lives in the Kiri Vong district of Takeo province. She is 41 years old, married and has two children. Both of her children attend school. In order to support the family, she and her husband have been working in their paddy rice field for 23 years. They can earn 39,000 KHR on average per day.

She has completed 3 loans with VisionFund already. Now she is requesting the fourth loan from VisionFund to cover expenses on her rice field such as fertilizer and seed purchases. 

The income will be used for her family's food and health care, and her children's education.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and seed

loans.name: Sum

texts.en:
Sum lives in the Borey Chulsa district of Takeo province. She is now 37 years old, married and has three children. Her family depends mainly on agriculture, such as her rice field and fishing for their living. She can earn 27,700 KHR on average per day.

She is now requesting her first loan with VisionFund to cover her business. She will use the money to buy fertilizer for the rice field and fishing materials. She expects that the income will help her cover her family's food and health care.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her rice field and fishing materials

loans.name: Yoem

texts.en:
Yoem lives in the Borey Chulsa district of Takeo province. She is 29 years old, married and has 3 children. Her eldest child attends school. Her family depends on their rice field and fishing for their living. She earns 28,700 KHR on average per day.

She is now requesting her first loan with VisionFund to cover the cost of purchasing fertilizer and fishing materials. She expects that the income will help her pay for her family's food and her children's education.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and fishing materials

loans.name: Phan

texts.en:
Phan lives in the Borey Chulsa district of Takeo province. She is 51 years old now. Her living depends on her rice field and raising ducks. She earns about 70,400 KHR per day

She is now requesting her first loan with VisionFund to cover the expenses of fertilizer and duck feed purchasing. She expects that the income will help her expand her business and cover health care expenses.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her rice field and duck feed

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy toothpaste and toothbrushes for resale.

loans.name: Kanyange Group

texts.fr:
Samson  fait partie du groupe Kanyange  et  habite à  Bubanza. Il a 38 ans  et est marie  à Clairia, une cultivatrice. Ensemble ils ont 6 enfants âgés de 10 à 13 ans dont 2 étudient.
Il a sous sa charge ses 2 beaux frères.

Il fait le commerce des fruits(mangues, orange,…)   depuis  15  ans. 

Il est à son deuxième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter une grande quantité de fruits (mangues, orange,…) à revendre pour gagner plus.

Dans les  prochaines années, il  voudrait  construire  une belle maison et acheter une voiture et  voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Samson is a member of the Kanyange Group and lives in Bubanza.  He is 38 years old and married to Clairia, a vegetable grower.  Together they have six children, aged between ten and thirteen years old.  Two of their children currently attend school.  Samson is also responsible for his two brothers-in-law.

Samson has been selling fruit (mangoes, oranges, etc) for fifteen years.  This will be his second loan with the field partner, Turame.  He plans to use his loan to increase his working capital and buy a large quantity of fruit (mangoes, oranges, etc) for resale.  In this way, he hopes to increase his profits.

In the coming years, Samson would like to build a good house, buy a car and see his children study.

loans.use: to increase his working capital and buy a large quantity of fruit (mangoes, oranges, etc) for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for affordable and efficient cooking energy from Liquefied Petroleum Gas

loans.name: Mujeres Central La Cuchilla Group

texts.en:
La Cuchilla is a rural area in the Western Highlands of Guatemala in the Department of Sololá . Seven women have gathered together and have formed a new Friendship Bridge Trust Bank called “Mujeres Central La Cuchilla”. The ladies are quite excited to take out their very first loan. They will use the funds in their small businesses, which include the sale of flowers and vegetables, items for daily consumption and the sale of gifts. Others work in agricultural endeavors. 

Maria is a 26-year-old member of the Trust Bank and has had two years of education. She is single and works with her brother in their new small store with the goal of laying the foundation for a more successful and prosperous future. In the store, Maria offers various gifts and other curios. Maria is requesting a loan that she will use to expand her inventory and offer her customers balls, toys, plates, glasses and other kitchen items, cleaning supplies as well as certain items of clothing including socks. She is pleased that her business generates satisfactory income but sees possibilities for expanding it as the demand for items in the store is increasing. Besides working with her brother in the business, she has employed an additional helper to attend to her customers. Maria is happy and enthusiastic about the possibilities of additional capital to invest in her expanding business.

Besides obtaining a small loan from Friendship Bridge, clients benefit from the monthly non-formal educational trainings that are presented by a Loan Officer of the organization. The ladies are hungry to acquire new knowledge about healthy meals, medicinal plants and hygiene, women’s and children’s rights, as well as self-esteem. They are greatly aided by information about effective business practices including accounting, budgeting and customer service. It is this educational component combined with small loans that comprises the Microcredit Plus Program of Friendship Bridge. The ladies, their families and their community benefit.

It is nearly impossible for an impoverished woman in Guatemala to walk into a bank and take out a loan. Kiva  investors, with their generous loans, are so greatly valued and appreciated by  over 20,000 clients of Friendship Bridge. Thank you!

loans.use: To expand her inventory and offer her customers balls, toys, plates, glasses and other kitchen items

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy 1 sack of wheat flour, 1 large bottle of gas, 5 kg of sugar, 1 packet of salt, yeast and 1 packet of conditioning agent for his bakery business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for efficient cooking energy from Liquefied Petroleum Gas

loans.name: Nyamdavaa

texts.en: Mr. Nyamdavaa, 53 years old, lives with his wife and son in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been running an automobile repair workshop since 2011. His wife is unemployed and stays at home. Their son is a college student and works part time. He is requesting a loan of 3,000 USD to buy spare parts in order to improve his service. As automobile sales sky rocketed, repair of automobile increased and spare parts are in great demand.

loans.use: to buy spare parts

loans.name: Barhas

texts.en:
Mrs. Barhas is a 40-year-old single woman who lives in a Mongolian traditional nomadic yurt, the Ger, in Dundgovi province, Mongolia.
 
Barhas started her own tailoring service business at home in 2009. She has a lot of experience and has good taste and a sense of design in modern and traditional clothes. She pleases her customers with her well-designed and qualified clothing. She is now requesting a loan of 1,000,000 MNT to purchase a large amount of inventory to meet clients' orders on time. She is a hardworking and diligent woman.

loans.use: to purchase a large amount of inventory

loans.name: Les Associees Group

texts.fr:
Mme RAGNIMWENDE JUDITH SOLANGE  représente le groupe  LES ASSOCIEES. Mariée, elle est mère de 03enfants. Le plus âgée a 18ans et le moins âgé a 01an. 02 vont à l’école.
Mme est gérante de kiosque et vend aussi du vinaigre depuis 05ans. Elle s’approvisionne au marché de son secteur. 
Mme veut s’acheter 50cartons de bidons de 01kg de vinaigre et 10miches de pains.
Avec  ses bénéfices, elle veut épargner. Mme ambitionne ouvrir une grande boutique alimentaire.
texts.en:
Ragnimwende Judith Solange is the representative for the 'Les Associées' Group.  She is married and has three children.  The eldest is eighteen years old and the youngest is one year old.  Two of her children attend school.

Ragnimwende Judith Solange has been running a kiosk and selling vinegar for five years.  She buys her stocks at a local market.  She plans to use her loan to buy 50 boxes of one kilo bottles of vinegar, and ten loaves of bread.  With the profits that she will make, she hopes to increase her savings.  One day, Ragnimwende Judith Solange would like to open a large food shop.

loans.use: to buy 50 boxes of 1kg bottles of vinegar, and 10 loaves of bread for resale.

loans.name: Som Nooma Group

texts.fr:
Mme ZAHARATA EUGENIE représente le groupe  SOM NOOMA. Mariée, elle est mère de 03enfants. Le plus âgée a 30ans et le moins âgé a 20ans. Personne ne  va à l’école. Elle a 06 personnes en charge.
Mme vend des légumes depuis plus de 20ans. Elle s’approvisionne au marché de son secteur. 
Mme veut s’acheter 01sac et demi d’oignons, 01sac de maïs pour transformer en farine et vendre, 01carton de tomate.
Avec  ses bénéfices, elle veut renforcer son activité. Mme ambitionne s’acheter une parcelle.
texts.en:
Zaharata Eugenie is the representative of the 'Som Nooma' Group.  She is married and has three children.  The eldest is thirty years old and the youngest is twenty years old.  None of her children attends school, and she is responsible for six people.

Zaharata Eugenie has been selling vegetables for more than twenty years now.  She buys her supplies at a local market, and plans to use her loan to buy one and a half sacks of onions, one sack of maize to transform into flour and one box of tomatoes.  She will use her profits for strengthen her business.

Her ambition in the future is to buy a plot of land.

loans.use: to buy 1 and a half sacks of onions, 1 sack of maize to transform into flour and 1 box of tomatoes for resale.

loans.name: Irenge Group

texts.fr: Madame  Nshombo  est  présidente du groupe de credit  Irenge. Elle est âgée de 27 ans, mariée à un homme sans emploie  et  ensemble ils  ont  2 enfants  qui étudient tous. Le nouveau  prêt sollicité va acheter  15 rouleaux de fil et  10 douzaines de panier.  Elle souhaite agrandir son entreprise et construire une maison. Ainsi, elle remercie et encourage Hekima dans son initiative de booster les activités commerciales des femmes à faible revenu.
texts.en:
Nshombo is the president of the loan group 'Irenge'.  She is 27 years old and married to an unemployed man.  Together they have two children who both attend school.

This loan will help Nshombo to buy fifteen rolls of wire and ten dozen baskets.  She would like to expand her business and build a house.

Nshombo is grateful to the field partner, Hekima, for its initiative to boost the businesses of low income women.

loans.use: to buy 15 rolls of wire and 10 dozen baskets for resale.

loans.name: Virgen Del Rosario Del Cusco Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “VIRGEN DEL ROSARIO DEL CUSCO”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Veronica ella es conviviente y tiene 36 años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de comida, la socia también tiene un internet, la socia prepara diferentes platos como pollo con papas, sopas y saltados de carnes, la socia trabaja desde las 10:00 p.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 7 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un restaurant. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar productos para cocinar como pollo, carne y verduras.

Las socias que están pegados a la foto grupal se les tomo la foto después de la reunión porque pidieron permiso por motivos de trabajo.
 
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de venta de granos, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de artesanía.
 
 


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These are all members of the communal bank “Virgen del Rosario del Cusco”, located in the Cusco district, which belongs to the Cusco province in the department of Cusco.

Veronika, one of the members, is in a relationship. She is 36 years old and has two children. She works selling food, but she also has an internet café. She prepares different dishes, such as chicken with potatoes, soups and meat stews. She works from 10:00 am until 5:00 pm. She has been doing this for seven years and does very well. Her dream is to own a restaurant.

Veronika is requesting a loan to buy ingredients such as chicken, beef and vegetables.

The pictures attached to the group picture were taken after the meeting. These members could not attend because they had to work. The members of this group also sell clothes, grains, groceries and handicrafts. Veronika wants to thank all those who make part of this dream through this means. She promises to pay the installments according to plan.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as chicken, beef and vegetables.

loans.name: Emprendedores De La Segunda De Laderas Group

texts.es:
La señora Carmen socia de la alcancía comunal “emprendedoras de la segunda de laderas” es madre de 4 hijos de 35, 33 ,31 y 25 años, separada hace 20 años. Esta señora ha sabido sacar adelante a su familia gracias a su trabajo en una cuna donde también se dedica a la venta por catalogo. La señora cuenta que fue la necesidad la que la impulso a seguir adelante, ya que, al separarse de su esposo la señora quedo muy afectada, la señora tiene un negocio estable, con ventas diarias entre 2 y 4 personas, y del que se siente orgullosa y muy agradecida ya que gracias a este ha podido darle una buena calidad de vida a su familia y además ha conocido a mucha gente buena.
Con el crédito que ha recibido de EDAPROSPO, la señora tiene pensado comprar más productos en stock para así surtir su pequeña vitrina donde pone los productos en exhibición que  más vende, La señora Carmen se lleva bien con el grupo y refiere que hasta ahora todo ha ido de maravilla, y que se siente feliz de formar parte de este ya que tiene la oportunidad de socializar y compartir experiencias con otras madres como ella. Finalmente la señora comenta que se siente muy agradecida con los inversores extranjeros  KIVA que han hecho posible este crédito, y les hace la petición de seguir con esta loable labor de apoyo a gente necesitada con ganas de salir adelante.
texts.en:
Carmen is a member of the communal bank “Emprendedoras de la Segunda de Laderas”. She has four children aged 35, 33, 31 and 25. She separated from her partner twenty years ago. Carmen has been able to get ahead with her family thanks to her hard work. She works at a nursery school, but she also sells items on a catalog.

Carmen says that she was in need and that this situation gave her the energy she needed to get ahead. When she separated from her husband she was deeply affected. She now has a stable business, with two to four customers every day. She is proud of her business and feels thankful because thanks to it she has been able to give her family a good life and has met a lot of good people.

With the loan she received from EDAPROSPO, she is thinking of buying more products for a small showcase she has where she shows the products she sells the most. Carmen has a good relationship with the other members and says that everything has gone well so far. She is happy to be part of this group because she can be with other people and share experiences with other mothers like her.

She also wants to thank Kiva lenders, who made this loan possible. She asks them to continue with this humble activity of helping people in need who are willing to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy products such as creams and perfumes for her business.

loans.name: Samnang

texts.en:
Samnang lives in Borey Chulsa district of Takeo province. He is 31 years old, married, and has a son who is now 5 years old. He and his wife have been farming rice for 16 years. They earn 28,000 KHR on average per day. 

He has completed 1 loan with VisionFund and now is requesting another loan to purchase fertilizer and seeds. The income will be used to cover the family's food, health care, and child's education.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds for rice cultivation

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en:
Jennifer is 41 years old and married. She earns a living by fattening pigs in the Philippines. Jennifer is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. Jennifer has been in this business for 8 years and also earns additional income from selling avon products.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Him

texts.en:
Him lives in Ponhea Lue district of Kandal province. She is now 54 years old, married, and has 2 children. Both of her children attend school. She earns a  living by cultivating rice, which helps her earn 30,200 KHR on average per day.

She has completed 3 loans with VisionFund and is now requesting a new loan to purchase fertilizer and seeds. She expects that the income will help her improve her family's standard of living especially for food, healthcare, and education.

loans.use: to purchase fertililzer and seeds

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farming supplies and pay manual labour to tend her corn crops

loans.name: Compañeros De Ventanilla Group

texts.es: La señora Liliana es socia del grupo “Compañeros de Ventanilla”. Ella tiene cinco hijos de 27, 26, 11,5 y 3 años, Ella vive con su pareja y sus tres últimos hijos, compartiendo ambos los gastos económicos del hogar. Liliana es profesora y también se dedica a la venta por catalogo de productos de belleza, trabaja todos los días desde hace quince años. Ella está muy orgullosa de lo que ha logrado gracias a su negocio, y al préstamo que EDAPROSPO le brindo ya que ha podido incrementar en la compra de mercadería  para su negocio, y entre otras cosas darles una mejor calidad de vida a sus pequeños, Liliana se siente feliz de pertenecer al grupo ya que la relación es muy buena y cordial agradece mucho a los inversionistas KIVA por la ayuda prestada y les dice Gracias por la ayuda prestada y por la confianza  brindada.
texts.en: Liliana is a member of the group "Compañeros de Ventanilla." She has five children, ages 27, 26, 11, 5 and 3. She lives with her partner and their last three children, and both share the household expenses. Liliana is a teacher and also works selling beauty products through a catalog.  For the past 5 years, she has worked every day. She is very proud of what she has managed thanks to her business, and to the loan the EDAPROSPO offered her since she has been able to increase her purchase of merchandise for her business and among other things, provide a better quality of life for her little ones. Liliana is happy to belong to the group because the relationships are very good and friendly. She is very grateful to the Kiva investors for the loan and she says, "Thanks for the help of the loan and for the confidence it brings."

loans.use: to invest in beauty products for her stock

loans.name: Jose Joaquin

texts.es: José tiene 44 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus tres hijos de 18 años, 15 años y 10 años de edad. José se gana la vida por medio de la agricultura y además trabaja en el mercado cercano a su localidad halando bultos a diferentes vendedoras. José solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de las paredes de un cuarto para lo cual necesita materiales como: lámina galvanizada y madera. Sus condiciones habitacionales son muy humildes.
