A Doña Alba la asignaron como la fiscal del Banco Mujer, ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y comprometida con su comunidad, tiene 52 años es casada y madre de 4 hijos, viven con ella solo los 2 hijos menores y su esposo.  Ella y toda su familia se dedican a las actividades agropecuarias, en una pequeña parcela que les otorgó una Institución de Bien Social. El crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos, alimentos, concentrados, así como algunos insumos para la agricultura como semillas y fertilizantes. Las ganancias que generan esas actividades son la única fuente de ingresos para su familia. Es por eso que este primer crédito va ser de gran ayuda para ella y su familia, ya que le permitirá fortalecer su negocio, y así seguir apoyando con los estudios de sus hijos que cursan la secundaria y universidad.
texts.en:
Doña Alba is one of the members of Banco Mujer Monte Sión, a new group made up of eight members from a very rural settlement called Camuro. All the women have a good deal of experience in working on a team and as an organization, since they have worked together on different community projects for a long time.  

The group assigned Doña Alba as the comptroller of Banco Mujer. She is a very hardworking woman who is committed to her community. She is 52 years old, married, and the mother of four children. Only her husband and the two younger children live with her. She and her whole family work in agriculture on a small parcel that was granted to them by a social welfare institution. 

Alba will invest the loan in the purchase of chickens, food, and concentrated pelleted feed, as well as some farming supplies like seeds and fertilizers. The earnings generated by this work are the only source of income for her family. That is way this first loan will be a big help for her and her family: it will allow her to strengthen her business so that she can continue supporting the education of her children, who are in secondary school and university.

loans.use: to purchase chickens, food, and concentrated pelleted feed as well as some farming supplies like seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Miguel De Jesús

texts.es:
Miguel de 37 años de edad, estudio hasta quinto grado, está acompañado, su pareja se dedica a la venta de pascado, actividad que realiza todos los días, la venta la realiza en las comunidad, tiene 4 hijos unos estudian y los más grandes trabajan para aportar a los ingresos de la casa, ya que son una familia de escasos recursos.

Él es seguridad en una empresa distribuidora de energía eléctrica, ya tiene más de cuatro años de prestar sus  servicios, la necesidad de tener una fuente de ingreso lo llevo, a tomar la decisión, también se dedica a la agricultura, una actividad que realiza desde pequeño, el empleo le queda a unos tres kilómetros de distancia, el recorrido lo hace en bicicleta por lo que se ahorra ese dinero, él hace turnos de 24 hora, por lo que también descansa el mismo tiempo.
      
El préstamo que está solicitando, es para pagar el alquiler de la tierra en donde cultivara este año.
  
Su deseo es tener primero lo más necesario para la familia, por lo que espera trabajar siempre mientras Dios le regale salud y vida, el préstamo le ayudara en satisfacer la necesidad del arrendamiento de la tierra.
texts.en:
Miguel is 37 years old and studied up to Grade 4. He is in a common-law relationship. His wife sells fish which she does every day and she sells in their community. They have 4 children. Some of them study and the older ones work to make income for the household as they are a low income family.

Miguel works as security for a company that distributes electrical energy. He has worked there for over 4 years. He decided to work there as he needed a source of income. He also farms, something he has done since he was small. His work is about 3 km away and he goes by bicycle to save money. He works a 24 hour shift and then has the same amount of rest time.

The loan that he is requesting is to pay the rent on the land he will grow on this year. His wish is to first see to his family's needs so he hopes to continue to work as long as God grants him life and health. The loan will help him fill the need to rent land.

loans.use: to pay the rent on the land he will plant this year.

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos de 56 años de edad, tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar hasta tercer grado, tomando en cuenta que el estudiar en su tiempo era sumamente un esfuerzo grande el que se tenía hacer, su pareja falleció de una enfermedad, por lo que fue a  ella sola quien le toco luchar por el autosustento, solo un hijo vive con ella quien también le apoya con los trabajos que toca realizar, también cuida un nieto quien sus papas por ir buscando un mejor futuro decidieron partir al extranjero.

Ella se dedica a la venta de quesadillas, yuca, pasteles etc., desde que su esposo falleció le a tocado rebuscarse por los ingresos al hogar, a pesar que recibe remesas, no es quien se atenga a solo estar esperando que le venga el dinero, no tiene más actividades a las que se dedique, la venta la tiene en su casa, pero cuando no vende lo esperado, se va de casa en casa a realizar la venta, cuando hace esto recorre unos dos kilómetros, la actividad la realiza todos los días, la venta de las quesadillas la hace por la mañana y la de otro por la tarde.

El préstamo que está solicitando es para comprar arena, cemento, hierro para mejorar el corredor de su vivienda. 

Su deseo es poder tener primero lo más necesario para la familia, el préstamo le ayudara en satisfacer la necesidad de mejorar la parte del corredor de su casa, ya que viene el invierno y se le mojara se no lo repara hoy.
texts.en:
Santos is 56 years old. She was able to study as far as third grade, bearing in mind that in those days getting an education really required a huge amount of effort. Her husband died of an illness and so she had to fight for survival. She has just one son living with her who also helps her with the jobs he does. She also looks after a grandson whose parents went to live abroad in search of a better future.

She makes a living selling quesadillas, cassava and pastries etc. Since her husband died she has had to work hard to find income for the household, even though she gets sent payments. She is not someone who will just sit back and wait for money to arrive. She does not have any other jobs. She makes her sales from her home, but when she does not sell as much as she had hoped, she goes out selling from door to door. She walks about 2 km doing this. She works every day, selling quesadillas in the morning and the other items in the afternoon. 

She is asking for the loan to buy sand, cement and iron to improve the passageway in her home. She wants first of all to have everything the family needs. The loan will help her to make much needed improvements to the passageway area of her home, since the winter is coming and the area will get wet if it isn't repaired soon.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement and iron to improve the passageway in her home.

loans.name: Miguel Ángel

texts.es:
Miguel de 63 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, por la necesidad que se tenía en el hogar de llevar lo más necesario para el sustento de la familia, su esposa se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar, es la que ve que todo esté bien y ordenado, nadie de los hijos estudia, unos están en el extranjero y los demás ya están aparte, nadie más vive con ellos. 

Él se dedica a la agricultura, desde los 10 años su padre le inculco los valores morales y espirituales, el respeto por los demás, aparte de enseñarle el respeto por lo que hacía también fue quien le enseño todo lo relacionado al trabajo, donde lo vio como la única forma de sostener la familia, también tiene ganado, los que cuida y al tener una necesidad tiene donde echar mano, la parcela que cultiva está a unos 500 metros de distancia, por lo que el recorrido lo hace a pie, nadie más de la familia se  dedica a trabajar junto a él, su horario de trabajo es de 6 am a 12 md.    

El préstamo será invertido para comprar abono, fertilizantes, herbicidas, pesticidas y pago a personas que le ayuden a realizar los trabajos, hoy que viene la época de invierno, otro gasto en el que se implicara será en el arrendamiento de la tierra, la mejora será el ir avanzando en los trabajos, y la necesidad satisfecha es el tener su propio capital de trabajo.
texts.en:
Miguel is 63 years old and never had the opportunity to study. He had to go out and work to help support the household. His wife does the housework. It is her that makes sure everything is well and orderly. None of his children are at school. Some of them live abroad and the others live elsewhere. No one else lives with them.

Miguel farms. His father taught him when he was 10 years old and instilled his moral and spiritual values and respect for others. He also taught him to respect what he did and taught him everything to do with work as he saw that as the only way to support a family. Miguel also has cattle which he cares for and gives him something to do. The land he grows on is 500 meters from his house so he walks. No one else in the family works with him. He works from 6 am until 12 noon.

The loan will be used to buy manure, fertilizer, herbicide, pesticide and to pay for labor to help him with the work. The rainy season is coming and another cost will be paying the rent on the land. It would be better if he has advanced in his work and the need will be fulfilled by having his own capital.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizer, herbicide, pesticide and pay for labor to help him.

loans.name: Sandra Jannett

texts.es: Doña Sandra es madre de dos hijos de las edades de 18 y 24 años quienes trabajan y estudian, ella los apoya con su labor como costurera que realiza desde la edad de 13 años, solicita el crédito para invertir en materia prima como telas para hacer mosquiteros, producto que vende continuamente, con sus ingresos ella con los gastos del hogar.
texts.en: Sandra is the mother of two children aged 18 and 24 years old who work and study. She supports them with her work as a seamstress which she has done since she was 13. She is requesting  a loan to invest in the purchase of raw material like cloth to make mosquito nets, a product that she sells continuously. Her income helps her support the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy cloth for mosquito nets.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cider blocks, cement, sand and re-bar.

loans.name: Koeurn

texts.en:
Koeurn is a resident of Samrong Torng district, located in Kampong Speu province. She is a forty-two-year-old, married woman. Like every other villager, she does farming for living. Apart from that, Koeurn also works as a factory worker to earn extra money for her family. The average daily income for her family is only 17,800 KHR.

This is the first time that she is seeking a microloan from Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Koeurn is applying for a loan amount of 1,400,000 KHR. She plans to use it to buy fertilizer for her cash-crop. Also, she plans to use a portion of the loan money to buy necessary household products. She strongly believes that the loan from Kiva’s partner, VisionFund, enables her to pave a way to uplift the condition of her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her cash-crop, and household products.

location.town: Kampong Speu province, Samrong Torng district

loans.name: Eliazar Alexander

texts.es:
Eliazar de 34 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, está acompañado, su pareja se dedica a los oficios de la casa y a cuidar su hijo y a tender a su esposo, son de familia muy humilde pero trabajadora, su primer hijo todavía no va a la escuela, nadie más vive von ellos.


Él es promotor de salud, trabaja en la unidad de salud, cuenta con cuatro años de experiencia laboral, su trabajo aparte de ser pesado, es muy importante, ya que es quien se encarga de verificar todas las personas del área rural que estén bien y de no ser así busca el apoyo necesario para ayudar, con la inducción de un amigo que también es promotor le ayudo a conseguir la plaza, el lugar de trabajo le queda a unos 5 kilómetros, por lo que el recorrido lo hace en bus, su horario de trabajo es 7 am a 4 pm.        

El préstamo será invertido  en la compra de muebles para el hogar, el mejoramiento será el que tenga la casa más preparada, la necesidad satisfecha será el irse haciendo ya de sus cosas.
texts.en:
Eliazar is 34 years old and finished his high school studies. He has a partner who looks after the house and takes care of her son and husband. They are a very modest but hard-working family. Their firstborn son does not go to school yet. No-one else lives with them.

Eliazar is a health promoter and works in the health unit. He has four years of work experience. Although his work is difficult it is very important, since he is the person in charge of checking that everyone in the rural area is in good health. If they are not, he gets the necessary support to help them. He was introduced by a friend who is also a health promoter and helped him to get the job. His workplace is 5km away and he gets there by bus. His working day is from 7am to 4pm.

The loan will be used to buy furniture for the home, an improvement which will make the house better equipped. This will satisfy the need to make a start on things.

loans.use: to buy furniture for the home.

loans.name: Flor De Laguna Ita Group

texts.es:
El grupo Flor de Laguna Ita está en su ciclo número 3 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde ellas forman parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza donde están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, luchando por mejorar las condiciones de vida de cada una.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Fidelina, quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel 3, es decir que va creciendo por medio de su trabajo. Ella se dedica a las ventas, ya que tiene una despensa en la que todos los días trabaja desde muy tempranas horas de día, es muy emprendedora y quiere seguir trabajando para ayudar a su familia.
La Sra. Fidelina solicita de este préstamo para la compra  de  productos varios para la venta, como harina,  verduras, fideos, aceite, azúcar, etc. para luego vender a los clientes, lo que le ayudará a tener a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The group “Flor de Laguna Ita” (Flower from Ita’s Lagoon) is in its third cycle of the program for women, here they are part of a program to eliminate poverty, fighting to improve the life conditions of each and every one of them.
One of the members is Fidelina, for whom the last study indicated a poverty level of 3, which means she is improving through her work.  Her activity is sales, she has a convenience store where she works at since the early hours of the day, she is very entrepreneurial and wants to continue to work to help her family.
Fidelina requests a loan to buy a variety of products to sell such as flour, vegetables, pasta, oil, sugar, etc. she will then sell them to her customers and this will help her complete her business plan, helping her increase income.

loans.use: to buy flour, vegetables, pasta, oil, sugar, etc. and then sell them.

loans.name: Calistro

texts.es: Es un hombre jovial, trabajador, originario de Puerto Cabezas, tiene 35 años de edad, está casada, tiene un bebé de 7 meses y dos hijos adolescentes, que cursan su primer año de secundaria.  Con el objetivo de mejorar su vivienda de tambo y madera, que su familia viva de manera segura, solicita su primer financiamiento, para comprar materiales de construcción para cambiar la madera de su vivienda, debido a que desde hace aproximadamente 12 años no la sustituye y se encuentra en estado deteriorado: madera rustica y cepillada, clavos, zinc y para cubrir costos de mano de obra. Su sueño es brindarle a su familia una vivienda con las condiciones adecuadas y apoyar al desarrollo profesional y humano de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Calistro is a happy hard-working man, a native of Puerto Cabezas. He is 35 years old, married and has a 7 month old baby and two adolescent children who are in their first year of secondary school.

With the objective of improving their house made of wood built on stilts and so that his family can live in security he is requesting his first loan. With it he will buy construction material to replace the wood on his house. It has not been replaced in 12 years and is in a deteriorated state. He wants to buy rough planed wood, nails, zinc sheeting and cover the cost of labor. His dream is to provide his family with adequate conditions and support the professional and human development of his children.

loans.use: to buy construction material to replace the wood on his house.

loans.name: Lilibeth

texts.es: Lilibeth de 31 años de edad, es una mujer casada y madre de 3 hijos en las edades de  2 7, 11 y 12 años.Hace 4 años desde el año 2010, inició su sueño e  tener un centro de educación preescolar, pues habia terminado pedagogia y con su hermana todas las noches pensaban cual seria la mejor manera. Hoy cuenta con 40 niños, a quienes atiende desde las 12 del día hasta las 4 de la tarde, ellos habitan en a comunidad donde se encuentra Lilibeth ubicada y hoy tiene el propósito de integrar a mas niños en niveles de primaria. Su mayor desafio es encontrar fuentes de finaciación que apoyen el mejoramiento locativo de su negocio y esto es exactamente la razón or la cual acude a un credikiva, primer finacimeinto que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comrpará materiales de construcción para mejorara las instalaciones especialmente donde se encuentra la cafeteria. Con esta inversión, su escuela proyectará la imagen de calidad, con la que quiere llegar muy lejos.
texts.en:
Lilibeth, who is 31 years old, is a married woman and mother of three children who are 7, 11, and 12 years old. Four years ago, in the year 2010, she began her dream of having a center for pre-school education. She had finished a teaching degree, and she and her sister were spending every evening thinking about the best way to go about it. 

Today she has forty children who attend from noon until 4:00 in the afternoon. They live in the Lilibeth's community, and now she has the intention of including more children at the primary school level. Her biggest challenge is finding sources of funding that will support the improvements to her business property and this is exactly the reason that she is turning to a Kiva loan. 

This is the first loan she has taken out through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo; with it, she will buy construction materials to improve the facilities, especially where the cafeteria is located. With this investment, the school will project an image of quality, which she hopes will take her far.

loans.use: to buy cement fiber board and cement blocks to make improvements to her facility

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing, socks, jeans and other items to sell.

loans.name: San Miguel Group

texts.es:
El grupo San Miguel está en su ciclo número 1 del programa de comités, es de una ciudad llamada Curuguaty, una zona eminentemente rural, donde todas trabajan en actividades de campo o rural. Todas son mujeres muy luchadoras.
La Sra. Wilma es una de las integrantes de este grupo, es una mujer muy sacrificada y luchadora, que se destaca por el gran entusiasmo que siempre tiene, ya que quiere poder mejorar su vida y ayudar a sus seres queridos. Ella se dedica a la cría, venta o faena de animales de corral, como ser gallinas, patos, cerdos, y demás. 
Ella pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de balanceados, para que de esa forma pueda seguir con la cría de sus animales, que le permitirá seguir trabajando y luchando como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por la oportunidad que todas están recibiendo.
texts.en:
The group San Miguel is in its first cycle of the committee program, in a city called Curuguaty, a predominantly rural area where everyone works in agriculture or other rural activities. The group members are all women with a fighting spirit.

Mrs. Wilma is one of the members of this group, she is a self-sacrificing, fighting woman, who stands out for the enthusiasm that she always displays. She wants to improve her life and help her loved ones.  She works raising, selling and slaughtering of barnyard animals, like chickens, ducks, pigs and others. 

She asks for this loan to buy animal feed, that way she can continue raising her animals, which will allow her to continue working and fighting like she has been doing. She is grateful for the opportunities given to her and her group members.

.

loans.use: to buy animal feed.

loans.name: Kuña Pora Group

texts.es:
Kuña Pora se llama este grupo que se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la ciudad de Pilar, ya que todas y cada una está poniendo el mayor esfuerzo para poder ayudar a sus seres queridos y a sus familias por medio del trabajo en conjunto de todas.
Vicenta es parte de este grupo, además es la presidenta, y comenta que siempre trata de motivar a sus compañeras a luchar por el sueño que cada una tiene, y conforme a ello poder dar a sus familias todo lo que no pudieron tener. Vicenta es comerciante y se dedica a la venta de productos varios para el hogar, y pide este préstamo para la compra de esos productos, como ser jabones, aceites, comestibles y demás.
Todas las integrantes de este grupo se pusieron como meta el crecimiento de cada una, no solo en lo económico, sino también en lo personal.
En la foto del grupo aparecen 14 mujeres, ya que el grupo tiene 14 integrantes, pero en este ciclo solo 12 de ellas piden este préstamo, y las otras 2 solo integran el grupo.
texts.en:
Kuña Pora is the name of this group, which was formed by various neighbours in the city of Pilar getting together. Each and every one of them is putting in the maximum effort to help their loved ones and families by all working together.

Vicenta is a member of this group and she is also the president. She says that she always tries to motivate her companions to fight for the dream which each of them has, and by doing this to be able to give their families everything which they were unable to have before. Vicenta is in business and makes a living selling various products for the home. She is asking for this loan to buy more of these products, such as soap, oil, food and other items.

All of the members of the group have the goal of growth for each individual, not just financially but also personally. 

There are 14 women in the photo because there are 14 members in the group, but only 12 of them are asking for a loan in this cycle. The other 2 just belong to the group.

loans.use: to buy soap, oil, food and other items.

loans.name: John Jairo

texts.es: John es un humilde trabajador que aprendió de la profesión de ebanistería practicando en el taller de su padre y ha ejercido estos últimos años y con la que ha mantenido a su familia constituida por su esposa e hijo los cuales espera siempre tener en unas excelentes condiciones de vida y que no lleguen a pasar ninguna necesidad solicita un crédito para cumplir un sueño que no solo se lo trazo él si no que s ello prometió a su padre el cual es tener un negocio que se caracterice por la calidad de trabajo y que genera buen volumen de empleos pues es bien sabido por sus vecinos de la calidad de persona que era el padre John, el crédito será usado para la compra de espumas y telas para la fabricación de muebles y silletería para la venta haciendo conocer cada vez más como un humilde e ingenioso ebanista.
texts.en:
John is a modest worker who learnt the profession of carpentry by practising in his father's workshop and has done this for the last few years. In this way he has been able to support his family, which consists of his wife and son. He hopes to always be able to provide excellent living conditions for them and hopes they are never in need. 

He needs a loan in order to fulfil a dream, which he didn't just think up by himself but also made a promise to his father, of having a business which is known for the quality of its work and which provides a good number of employment opportunities. His father John was well known among the neighbours for being a person of quality.

The loan will be used to buy foam and fabric to make furniture and sets of chairs to sell, so he can become more and more well known as a modest and ingenious carpenter.

loans.use: to buy foam and fabric for making his own furniture.

loans.name: Kuña Katupyry Group

texts.es:
El grupo Kuña Katupyry   está compuesto   por   24 integrantes, están en  el 6to. ciclo del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante ya que todas  se encuentran en la misma localidad y también están dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, donde a través de la encuesta de los cincuenta indicadores están luchando por mejorar.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Ulvina, quien se dedica a la venta de artículos de primera necesidad en su despensa, también hace carga de celulares, ella es una mujer muy sacrificada, que con esfuerzo, y por sobre todo con arduo trabajo está luchando por ayudar a su familia y a sus seres queridos, ya que sabe que trabajando es la única forma de salir adelante y lograr sus objetivos.
Ulvina pide este préstamo para ampliar su negocio de despensa, ya que con esto ayuda a su familia, y da a sus hijos lo que ella no pudo tener. Agradece también por esta oportunidad que está recibiendo, y que le será de mucha ayuda para poder crecer y mejorar en su emprendimiento.
En la foto aparecen 24 mujeres, ya que son 24 las mujeres que integran este grupo, pero por este ciclo solo 22 piden este prestamo.
texts.en:
The Kuña Katupyry group is made up of 24 members. They are in their sixth cycle of the women's committee program, where all work and help each other to get ahead since they all live in the same area and also are part of the program of poverty elimination, where through the measurement tool of 50 indicators they are fighting to improve. 

One of the members is Ulvina, who works selling staples and also charges cell phones. She is a selfless woman, who with much effort and above all hard work is fighting to help her family and her loved ones, since she knows that working is the only way to get ahead and achieve her goals. 

Ulvina asks for this loan to expand her store, since this is how she helps her family, and give her children what she couldn't have. She is grateful also for the opportunity that she is receiving and it will be a great help to her to be able to grow and improve her business

There are 24 women in this photo, since 24 women make up the group, but in this cycle, only 22 are asking for this loan.

loans.use: Ampliar negocio de despensa.

loans.name: Bety

texts.es:
Bety es una madre de dos niños que se han convertido en el motor de su vida y su motivación diaria para trabajar e intentar salir adelante por sus propios medios.
Ella se gana la vida vendiendo todo tipo de mercancía como ropa, accesorios, elementos para el hogar, entre otros, oficio que aprendió de una amiga que muy amablemente se lo enseño para que trabajara y consiguiera el sustento para sus hijos.
Ella es una mujer dedicada, guerrera y muy emprendedora, con deseos de progreso y con una experiencia de 5 años en el medio.
Actualmente desea ampliar su negocio y generar más ingresos para su hogar, por ésta razón solicita un aliento económico para comprar surtido de productos al por mayor, generando así mas utilidades.
Su principal dificultad es su situación de salud que en muchas ocasiones no la deja trabajar.
texts.en:
Bety is the mother of two children who have become the driving force in her life and her daily motivation to work and try to get ahead by her own means.

She makes her living selling all sorts of merchandise such as clothing, accessories, and household goods, among other things.  She learned this profession from a friend who kindly taught her so that she could work and be able to support her children.

She is a fighter, a very dedicated and enterprising women, with the desire to progress and with 5 years of experience in this work. 

At the moment she wishes to expand her business and generate more income for her home, and for that reason she asks for this loan to purchase a range of products in bulk, generating more income.

Her primary difficulty is her health situation which many times does not let her work.

loans.use: to purchase a wide variety of merchandise such as clothing and household supplies

loans.name: Hortencia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal JUNTOS POR EL DESARROLLO ECHARATI,el banco está ubicado en la provincia de La Convención ,distrito de Echarate y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Hortencia tiene 70 años de edad, es viuda y tiene 5 hijos, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias alquilando habitaciones en su casa, la socia lleva buen tiempo con este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia a la vez es cesante de una institución privada, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para realizar el mantenimiento de una de sus habitaciones.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Hortencia belongs to the communal bank "Together for the Development of Echarati." The bank is located in the province of La Convención, in the district of Echarate and the department of Cusco. 

Hortencia is 70 years old, she is a widow and she has five children.  She spends her time in daily activities related to renting rooms in her home.  She has been working in this area for many years and it is going well thanks to the efforts that she puts into her business every day.  At the same time she has been layed off from a private institution, so she helps her family get ahead by working renting out rooms in her home. 

She is asking for a loan in order to maintain one of the bedrooms.  She is thankful for the funding offered by Kiva and promises to comply with the established repayment plan.

loans.use: To complete maintenance work on one of the rooms that she rents in her home.

loans.name: Josefa

texts.es: Josefa es la propietaria de una peluquería, que inició desde hace 4 años, después de adquirir su experiencia en el oficio, trabajando como empleada de una peluquería.  Con sus ahorros, pues ha sido disciplinada en este aspecto, pudo independizarse dando apertura a su servicio de mejoramiento de imagen personal en un local. Josefa tiene como meta adecuar totalmente su infraestructura de negocio para ofrecer un mejor servicio y continuar ofreciendo las diferentes líneas de productos como peinado, masaje, blower, maquillaje etc.  En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva,  con el cual comprará cemento, baldosas para enchapar y adecuar elegantemente su local. A futuro su meta es tener 2 empleadas, que impulsen el crecimiento de su negocio, pues su único desafío es lograr fuentes de financiación, que están siendo superadas poco a poco, mediante su credikiva.
texts.en: Josefa owns a hair salon that she started four years ago after gaining experience as an employee at another hair salon.  With her savings (she has been disciplined at it) she was able to become independent and provide services for personal image improvement at her salon.  Josefa’s goal is to fully establish her business to offer better and multiple services such as hair styling, massage, hair drying, make up, etc.  She is currently requesting a credit from kiva, with which she will buy concrete and tile to have an elegant salon.  In the future her goal is to have two employees that will help her grow the business, her challenge is to obtain financing, which she is slowly overcoming, in part by this kiva loan.

loans.use: buy concrete and tile to have an elegant hair salon.

loans.name: Touch

texts.en:
Touch is a resident of Samrong Torng district, located in Kampong Speu province. She is a fifty-one-year-old widow, and she has one child living dependent on her. Like every other villager, Touch does farming to support her family. She has been a farmer for ages. The farming business makes an average income of 23,900 KHR per day for her family.

She has been a borrower of Kiva’s partner, VisionFund, for one loan cycle already. She has repaid the past loan completely. It enabled her to improve her family's living conditions. Now, Touch is applying for a microloan of 1,600,000 KHR. She plans to use loan money to buy fertilizer for her cash-crop. Touch strongly believes that loans from Kiva’s partner, VisionFund, enable her to uplift her family's lifestyle, at a gradual pace.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her cash-crop

location.town: Kampong Speu province, Samrong Torng district

loans.name: Lonh

texts.en:
Lonh is a resident of Samrong Torng district, located in Kampong Speu province. She is a fifty-six-year-old widow. She is a mother, who has one child living under her support. Like every other villager, Lonh does farming for her living and struggles to put her child in school.

Lonh has been a borrower of Kiva’s partner, VisionFund, for five loan cycles already. She has repaid her past loans, completely. The loans have unlocked a way to improve her family's condition.

In this sixth loan cycle, Lonh is seeking a microloan of 2,000,000 KHR. She plans to use loan money in her farming business, to buy fertilizer and seed. She strongly believes that the loans enable her to uplift her family's lifestyle, at a gradual pace.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seed

location.town: Kampong Speu province, Samrong Torng district

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en:
Victoria finished her college education, but prefers to work abroad. When she had accumulated enough savings, Victoria decided to put up a sari-sari store as her source of income, while her husband works abroad. She has been blessed with two children, whom she is presently sending to school. Victoria doesn't have any other dream, except for her children. She wants them to finish their college and become degree holders. Victoria believes that holding a degree was an edge in applying for a job. She wants them to become professionals someday and have stable jobs.

With regard to her business, Victoria is borrowing a loan of PHP 30,000. She will use it to buy grocery items and beverages to sell. She wishes to earn more income, to support the family's daily household needs. Her business serves as her help to her husband, in carrying their needs.

loans.use: to buy grocery items and beverages to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a new freezer and replace the one he has which is in very bad shape

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a variety of sandals and beauty products to sell

loans.name: Sam Ang

texts.en:
Sam Ang is a resident of Samrong Torng district, in Kampong Speu province. She is a thirty-five-year-old, married woman. She is also the mother of a child, who does farming and works as factory worker for her living. The primary income of Sam Ang's family comes from farming activity. On average, her family earns 27,000 KHR per day.

She has been a borrower of Kiva’s partner, VisionFund, for two loan cycles already. She has completely repaid the past loans. They enabled her to improve her family's living conditions. In this third loan cycle, Sam Ang is seeking a microloan of 2,000,000 KHR. She plans to use it to buy fertilizer for her cash-crops. She strongly believes that the loans allow her to uplift her family lifestyle, at a gradual pace.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her cash-crops

location.town: Kampong Speu province, Samrong Torng district

loans.name: Juán

texts.es: Juán, tiene la edad  de 43 años, está casado, vive con sus hijos y esposa  que son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de fertilizantes, fungicidas y pagar mano de obra en trabajos de asistencia para el café, además de comprar algunas plantas de almácigo para hacer resiembras a inicio de lluvias esto con el objetivo de aumentar la densidad de plantas por área, además de aprovechar la buena fertilidad del suelo y las condiciones de clima y otras que favorecen al cultivo de café. Con estas mejoras al cultivo espera obtener un poco de ganancias y así mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia y también invertir un poco más en el área de cultivo y también cumplir algunas metas.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Juán, 43 years old, is married and lives with his children and wife, who are his first priority.  With this loan he plans to purchase fertilizer, fungicides and pay labor costs for the assistance for the coffee. In addition to purchasing some copperwood plants for reseeding at the beginning of the rainy season with the goal to increase the density of plants in this area, he would like to take advantage of the good soil fertility and the climatic and other conditions  that support growing coffee. With these improvements to the crop, he hopes to make some profit and so improve the living conditions of his family and also invest a little more in the crop area and also meet some other goals. This is the first loan that he has gotten from FUDECOSUR. He hasn't had any previous loans in state banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered him a loan with better conditions and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: assist the coffee crop

loans.name: Ayhal

texts.ru:
Айхал жительница района Яван, усердно занимающаяся растениеводством. Она начала свою земледельческую деятельность 4 года назад, когда стала членом дехканского хозяйства. Айхал на своих участках земли выращивает овощи и бахчевые культуры. Она очень радуется когда получает хороший урожай.   
В возрасте 27 лет Айхал уже имеет троих детей. Ее муж каждый год едет в Россию на заработки. Айхал живет в доме родителей мужа.
Сейчас она активно готовится к посевам и просит кредит в размере 1025 долларов, чтобы купить качественные семена овощей, минеральные удобрения и топливо. Она ожидает поддержки, так как хочет вовремя провести посевные работы.
texts.en:
Ayhal is a resident of the Yavan District. She diligently practices crop farming. She started her crop farming business four years ago when she became a member of a communal farm. On her plot of land, Ayhal grows vegetables and gourds. She is overjoyed when she receives a good harvest.

At the age of 27, Ayhal already has three children. Every year, her husband goes abroad to Russia for work. Ayhal lives in her husband's parents' house.

Now she is actively getting ready for the sowing season. She is requesting a loan in the amount of 1,025 dollars to buy high-quality vegetable seeds, mineral fertilizers and fuel. She awaits your support as she wants to carry out her sowing on time.

loans.use: to buy high-quality vegetable seeds, mineral fertilizers and fuel.

loans.name: Ñaupaqman Purisum Group

texts.es: Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “Ñaupaqman Purisum” de la Asociación Arariwa y viven en el distrito de Santa Ana de la provincia de La Convención, Cusco, Perú. Matilde tiene 41 años y es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia. Su actividad económica es la agricultura donde tiene plantaciones de café, cacao, coca y cítricos como por ejemplo naranjas, lima, mandarina y limón. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar semillas. Los demás socios se dedican a la ganadería, a la agricultura, a la venta de comida, crianza de animales menores y otros brindan servicios profesionales. Los socios agradecen a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: These are members of the “Ñaupaqman Purisum” communal bank from the Araiwa Association and live in the Santa Ana district of the La Convencion province of Cusco, Peru.  Matilde is 41 years old and is a hardworking, entrepreneurial woman who supports her family.  She is a farmer and has coffee, cacao, coca, and citrus such as oranges, limes, mandarin oranges and lemons.  She needs this loan to buy seeds.  The other members raise livestock, farm, sell food, raise small animals, and others provide services.  The members are grateful to those who form part of this dream through this means and they are committed to making their payments on time.

loans.use: to buy seeds.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: Julia tiene 53 años de edad y vive en el distrito de Yanatile en la provincia de calca, Cusco, ella es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora que se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y la venta venta de frutas. Ella pertenece al banco comunal "Los Cumpliditos de Riobamba" y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar semillas y fertilizantes. Ella agradece a los inversionistas por el apoyo brindado y se compromete a pagar las cuotas con mucha responsabilidad y puntualidad.
texts.en:
Julia is 53 years old and lives in Yanatile district, in Calca Province in Cusco. She is an enterprising and hardworking woman who engages in farming and livestock raising and who sells fruit.  She belongs to "Los Cumpliditos de Riobamba” Communal Bank and at this time needs a loan to purchase seeds and fertilizer.

Julia is grateful to the investors for the help provided and is committed to making her repayments responsibly and punctually.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Annabelle

texts.en:
Annabelle is 44 years old and married with four children.

Annabelle works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Annabelle has borrowed and repaid seven loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 15 years and also earns an income from selling coconut wine.


Annabelle aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: San Cayetano Group

texts.es:
El grupo San Cayetano está en su  ciclo número 2 del programa de comité de mujeres, es de la ciudad de Curuguaty, la cual es una zona un poco alejada de la zona céntrica y aun se encuentra en crecimiento. Todas las integrantes se dedican a actividades rurales con las cuales ayudan a sus familias.
La Sra. Magdalena es una de las integrantes, ella se dedica a la cría, venta o faena de animales de corral, que con sacrificio viene haciendo hace varios años. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora que empieza su día desde muy tempranas horas del día. Su sueño es poder tener una granja donde podrá seguir con su trabajo y tener más animales que poder criar.
Magdalena pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de balanceados para sus animales, ya que de esa forma podrá seguir con la cría de sus animales, y poder luchar así por sus familias.
texts.en:
The San Cayetano Group is in its second cycle of the Women’s Communal Bank Program. It is in the city of Curuguaty, a zone that is somewhat far from the central zone, and still growing.  All of the members are engaged in rural activities, by which they help their families. 

Señora Magdalena is one of the members. She works raising, selling, or dressing farmyard animals—something that with sacrifice, she has been engaged in for several years.  She is a very hardworking person with a fighting spirit who starts her day in the early morning hours. Her dream is to be able to have a farm where she could continue with her work and have more animals to raise. 

Magdalena is requesting this loan in order to invest in the purchase of feed for her animals, as in this way she will be able to continue raising them, and thus she will be able to fight for her family.

loans.use: to purchase animal feed.

loans.name: Yovana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAN VALENTIN”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Yovana; la socia continua dedicándose al negocio picantería (es como un restaurant pero más pequeño y tradicional),la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa ,la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
 La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar arroz, aceite entre otros.
 La socia se siente agradecida por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the "San Valentín" communal bank. The bank is located in the district of Cusco, which is part of the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

The member is Señora Yovana. She continues to work at her "picantería" (it's like a restaurant, but smaller and more traditional). She has been earning her living with this business for a good amount of time, and it is going well for her thanks to the effort that she puts into it every day. She is a responsible and hardworking person. She would like to be able to continue working in order to continue supporting her family.

Yovana is requesting the loan to buy rice, oil, and more. She feels grateful for the loan and she promises to make her loan payments.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil, and more.

loans.name: Sokha

texts.en:
Sokha is 45 years old and a resident from Prey Chhor district, Kampong Cham province. Sokha is married and has three children, two of whom still depend on her income. 

To make a living, Sokha and her husband operate rice farming on their own land. Every day she carries out maintenance on her farm with the help of her husband. This work involves such things as removing weeds and damaged stems and fertilizing the crops. However, the income is barely enough to cover their daily costs.

This is the second loan she has asked for, and she has proved to be very punctual on paying her loans. On this occasion, Sokha is asking for this amount to buy stock of rice for fulfilling the family’s needs, as her last harvested rice was run out of from her barn. 

Sokha expresses her thanks in advance to all kind lenders.

loans.use: to buy stock of rice for fulfilling the family’s needs

loans.name: Honoria

texts.es:
La socia Honoria continua dedicándose al negocio de venta de ropa, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este negocio el cual le trae satisfacciones tanto económica como personales, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de casacas para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Honoria is continuing with her business selling clothing.  She is a responsible and hardworking person.  She's had this business for some time now, and it has brought her satisfaction, both on a financial and personal level.  She wants to continue to work so that she can continue to support her family.

Honoria is requesting a loan to buy jackets for her business.  She is grateful to be getting this loan, and she promises to comply with the payment terms.

loans.use: to buy jackets for her business

loans.name: Ursula

texts.es: Ursula tiene 53 años de edad y vive en el distrito de Yanatile en la provincia de calca, Cusco, ella es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora que se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y la venta venta de frutas. Ella pertenece al banco comunal "Los Cumpliditos de Riobamba" y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar frutas como por ejemplo naranjas y mangos. Ella agradece a los inversionistas por el apoyo brindado y se compromete a pagar las cuotas con mucha responsabilidad y puntualidad.
texts.en:
Ursua is 53 years old and lives in the district of Yanatile in the province of Calca, Cusco. She is an enterprising and hardworking woman who earns her living in farming, livestock production, and the sale of fruit. She belongs to the "Los Cumpliditos de Riobamba" communal bank, and at this time, she needs the loan to buy fruit like, for example, oranges and mangos.

She is grateful to the lenders for the support provided and she promises to make her payments with a great deal of responsibility and punctuality.

loans.use: to buy fruit like oranges and mangos.

loans.name: Guillerma

texts.en:
Guillerma previously accessed a 50,000 PHP loan that she utilized to buy cover binding, bond paper, toner and other things needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help for the education of her children and in their personal, household and business expenditures.

She would like to apply for another 50,000 PHP loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy materials and supplies needed in her bookbinding business. Her profits from her business will definitely help her to sustain their daily needs and the educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Guillerma hopes for her business to expand and dreams of having a successful and happy life. She meets with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her life and business every week and draw strength and inspiration from the word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group comprises 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital and pay micro-finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for materials such as cover binding, paper and toner for her business.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.en:
Yolanda is 62 years old and married with three children.

Yolanda works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Yolanda has borrowed and repaid seven loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for thirty years and also earns an income from pig fattening.

Yolanda aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda is 59 years old and married. She works very hard to provide for them.

Rosalinda runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items like canned goods, soft drinks, cooking oil, noodles, biscuits, snack foods, etc. to sell.

Rosalinda has been in this business for 20 years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, soft drinks, cooking oil, noodles, biscuits, snack foods, etc.

Rosalinda would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional items like canned goods, soft drinks, cooking oil, noodles, biscuits, snack foods, etc. to sell

loans.name: Guillermo

texts.es: Guillermo, tiene la edad  de 48 años, está casado, vive con sus hijos y esposa  que son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de fertilizantes, fungicidas y pagar trabajos de labores culturales en el terreno para evitar la erosión del suelo y mano de obra en trabajos de asistencia para el café, además de comprar algunas plantas de almácigo que se adapten a las condiciones de la zona y hacer la siembra a inicio de lluvias esto con el objetivo de aumentar la densidad de plantas por área, además de aprovechar la buena fertilidad del suelo y las condiciones de clima y otras que favorecen al cultivo de café. Con estas mejoras al cultivo espera obtener un poco de ganancias y así mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia y también invertir un poco más en el área de cultivo y también cumplir algunas metas.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Guillermo, 48 years old, is married and lives with his children and wife, who are his first priority. With the loan, he plans to purchase fertilizer, fungicide and pay labor costs for the cultivation of the land to avoid soil erosion and for the tasks that support the coffee crop. In addition to purchasing some copperwood plants that adapt to the conditions of the area and to plant them at the beginning of the rainy season with the goal to increase the density of plants in the area, he wants to take advantage of the the fertile soil and the climatic and other conditions that support growing coffee. With these improvements to the crop, he hopes to be able to get some profits and with them improve the living conditions of his family and also to invest a little more in the crop area and also meet some other goals. This is the first loan he has gotten from FUDECOSUR. He has not had any other loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR offers him a loan with better conditions and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: assist the coffee crop

loans.name: Khin

texts.en:
A resident of the Samrong Torng district of Kampong Speu province, Khin is a fifty-seven-year-old widow. She has two children living dependent on her. Just like every other villager, Khin does farming for her life. The farming business has earned her an average daily income of 28,400 KHR which is barely enough to support her two little children.

This is the first time that Khin is seeking a micro loan of 1,400,000 KHR from Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. She plans to use the loan money to buy fertilizer for her cash crop. Also, she plans to use a portion of the loan money to buy necessary household products. She optimistically hopes that the loan from Kiva’s partner VisionFund will enable her to improve her family's condition and pave the way for her children to go to school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her cash crop

location.town: Kampong Speu province, Samrong Torng district

loans.name: Elen Angelica

texts.es:
La socia Elen Angelica  se dedica al negocio de venta de productos de belleza, la socia vende lápiz labiales, cremas y perfumes, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los productos de belleza. La socia solicita le crédito para comprar cremas, lápiz labiales y perfumes.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Elen Angelica has a business selling beauty products.  She sells lipsticks, creams and perfumes.  She works from 8am until 7pm.  She's had this business already for a number of years.  Elen Angelica's dream is to have a store where she could sell her beauty products.  She is requesting a loan to buy creams, lipsticks and perfumes.

Elen Angelica is happy to be getting this loan, and she promises to comply with the payment terms.

loans.use: to buy creams, lipstick, and perfumes

loans.name: Fernanda

texts.es: Fernanda tiene 51 años de edad y vive en el distrito de Yanatile en la provincia de calca, Cusco, ella es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora que se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería, venta de hoja de coca y la venta venta de frutas. Ella pertenece al banco comunal "Los Cumpliditos de Riobamba" y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar frutas como plátanos. Ella agradece a los inversionistas por el apoyo brindado y se compromete a pagar las cuotas con mucha responsabilidad y puntualidad.
texts.en: Fernanda, 51, lives in the Yanatile district in the Calca province of Cusco.  She is an enterprising and hardworking woman who has several business activities, including: farming, animal husbandry, coca leaf sales, and fruit sales.  She belongs to the communal bank "Los Cumpliditos de Riobamba," and at this time she needs a loan to buy fruit such as bananas.  She thanks the lenders for the support they are providing, and she promises to make her payments responsibly and on time.

loans.use: to buy fruit

loans.name: Orlando

texts.en:
Orlando is a certified organic farmer who lives in the beautiful village of Villaluz in the Isabela province. He sees rice farming as a beneficial long-term investment for himself and his family. He believes that farming a sustainable agricultural crop is good for the environment and will help develop his local community.

Orlando wants to secure a Kiva microloan to purchase fertilizer and seedlings. He plans to use the revenue generated from his crop to educate his children and improve his family’s lifestyle.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and seedlings.

loans.name: Shirly

texts.en:
As the married mother of two children, Shirly works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from farming rice and corn. Shirly is borrowing PHP 5,500 through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her food business.

Shirly has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food business.

loans.name: Utkirjon

texts.ru:
Уткирчон добродушный и трудолюбивый мужчина. Он женат и имеет троих детей. Со своей семьёй Уткирчон живут в сельском посёлке. Для того, чтобы иметь доход на проживание Уткирчон занимается своим бизнесом. Вот уже на протяжении долгого времени  он занимается выращиванием сельхозкультуру, а также выращивает лук. Затем, когда собирает урожай, вывозит на большой базар и там продаёт свой урожай. Раньше он занимался деканством и потом решил реализовывать свой урожай. Также как дополнительный доход, Уткирчон имеет от другого вида бизнеса. У него имеется несколько голов скота, которых он выращивает для дальнейшей продажи.

Но сейчас Уткирчон хочет расширить бизнес, именно по выращиванию сельхозкультуры. И сейчас у него недостаточно собственных денежных средств, чтобы закупить семена для посева урожая. Поэтому он обратился в Арванд и хочет взять кредит для закупа семян для посева. Уткирчон очень надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Utkirjon is a kindhearted, hardworking man who is married and has three children.  He and his family live in a rural village where they grow crops such as onions for a living.  After gathering his harvest, he takes it to a big bazaar and sells it there.  Previously, he was a dekhan farmer and decided later to sell his own harvest instead.  To earn additional money on the side, he raises cattle for resale.  Currently, Utkirjon is seeking to grow more crops, but lacks the money to do so; as such, he's turned to Arvand for a loan to buy seeds for sowing.  Utkirjon is counting on this loan, and would like to thank Arvand in advance for their support.

loans.use: buy seeds

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies to help her coffee, corn and bean crops.

loans.name: Margie

texts.en:
Margie is a married woman with five children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 38 years old and has four children who are currently in school.

Margie has a general store business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more stock to sell in her general store.

Margie has been in this business for 12 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell in her general store

loans.name: Carmelita

texts.en:
Carmelita is 37 years old and has five children. She is married and has two children who are currently in school.

Carmelita is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Carmelita has been raising pigs for three years now, and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Carmelita would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Ana Laura

texts.es: Ana Laura, tiene la edad  de 30 años, está soltera, vive con sus  padres y hermanos  que son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra cerdos para el engorde y con buenas condiciones para el desarrollo y producción de carne.  La idea es aprovechar el espacio que tiene y las buenas condiciones de ubicación del chiquero  para los cerdos. Además de obtener unos cerdos de buena calidad que a corto plazo puedan estar gordos y de buena calidad. Con esta compra podrá desarrollar la actividad, y a la vez tener un ahorro que le permitirá ir teniendo más animales e invertir más en el proyecto y a la vez darle más ingresos económicos a su familia.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Ana Laura is 30 years old, single, and lives with her parents and siblings, who are her first priority. With the loan she plans to purchase some pigs to fatten them in good conditions for the development and production of meat. The idea is to take advantage of the space she has and the good condition of the location of the pigsty.  In addition to getting good quality pigs that in the short term can become fat and good quality, with this purchase she wants to develop the activity and also have some savings that will permit her to acquire more animals and invest more in the project that will provide more income for her family. This is the first loan that she has gotten from FUDECOSUR. She has not had any other loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered a loan with better conditions and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase pigs to fatten

loans.name: Sayora

texts.ru: Сайёра жизнерадостная и трудолюбивая женщина. Ей 39 лет. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 5 детей. Один из них совершеннолетний, а остальные дети еще не совершеннолетние. Сайёра с детства помогала родителям по выращиванию сельхоз культур и откармливанию скота. Сайёра более 10 лет самостоятельно занимается скотоводством. Она постепенно развевает бизнес. Сайёра данное время хочет построить ферму и развевать бизнес дальше. Она будет продавать больше молочных продуктов. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 10000 сомони для покупки строительных материалов как цемент, древесина, песок и т.п. для постройки фермы. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Sayora is a cheerful, hardworking 39-year-old who is married and raising 5 children.  One is a young adult, while the others are not of age yet.  Sayora has been raising cattle for more than 10 years.  She first started when she was a child, helping her parents grow crops and fatten cattle.  She's grown her farm bit by business bit by bit over the years, and is currently seeking to build a farm so she can sell more dairy products.  She is requesting a loan of 10,000 somoni to buy building materials such as cement, wood, sand and so on to build her farm, and is counting on your kindness.

loans.use: buy building materials such as cement, soil, wood etc. for building a farm

loans.name: Urozoy

texts.ru: Урозой 47-летняя сельская женщина из района Яван. Она замужем за дехканина. У них двое детей. Дочь учится в седьмом классе, а сын работает в России. В течение 3 лет Урозой и ее муж являются членами дехканского хозяйства. Они занимаются выращиванием огородных культур. Они опытные дехкане и всегда получают хороший урожай. Сейчас Урозой с мужем хотят провести очередной посев, но чтобы купить необходимые семена овощей, минеральных удобрений и топлива, они просят кредит. Этот кредит им важен для продолжения деятельности.
texts.en: Urozoy is a 47-year-old woman from the countryside in Yavan.  She is married to a dekhan farmer and has two children.  Her daughter is in 7th grade, while her son is a migrant worker in Russia.  For three years, Urozoy and her husband have been dekhan farmers.  They grow a variety of garden vegetables, and always have big harvests.  They have a lot of experience farming, and are making preparations for the upcoming sowing season, but they need a loan to be able to buy the necessary vegetable seeds, mineral fertilizers and fuel.  This loan is crucial for them to continue farming uninterrupted.

loans.use: buy vegetable seeds, mineral fertilizers and fuel

loans.name: Regie

texts.en: Regie is a young married man with one kid. He is a very hardworking person. He has been engaged in the farming business for two years. He is asking for a loan to buy agricultural materials, such as pesticide, fungicide and larvacide. He has a lot of dreams for his family. All he wishes for is to have their own house separate from his parents. And also he wants to save enough money for his children's future.

loans.use: to buy agricultural materials, such as pesticide, fungicide and larvacide.

loans.name: Nimia Celinda

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAN VALENTIN”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Nimia Celinda; la socia tiene 53 años de edad es soltera y tiene 02 hijos, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias trabajando en uno de los colegios de la zona, la socia es docente de profesión, la socia desea poder continua trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose  a este trabajo el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día  a su trabajo.
La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales didácticos.
 La socia se siente agradecida por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the “SAN VALENTIN” communal bank. This bank is located in the district of Cuzco, which belongs to the province and department of Cuzco. 

The member's name is Nimia Celinda. She is 53 years old, single and has 2 children. She alternates her home activities with her job working in one of the area high schools. She is a teacher by profession. She wants to be able to continue working and supporting her family in this way. She has done this work for a while and it is going well for her thanks to the dedication she puts into her work every day. 

She is asking for the loan to buy educational materials. She is grateful and committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy educational materials.

loans.name: Katia Lina

texts.es:
La socia Katia Lina se dedica al negocio de internet, la socia tiene cabinas de internet, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 5 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de internet. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar una computadora.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member Katia Lina is engaged in the internet business, owning internet booths. She works from 8:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m. She has been in this business for 5 years, and it is going very well for her. 

Her dream is to expand her internet business, and she is requesting a loan in order to purchase a computer. She is happy with the loan and she is committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to purchase a computer.

loans.name: Bernandita

texts.en: Bernandita is a farmer who grows corn for a living. She has been doing this for more than eighteen years and earns a good living from this work. She has successfully repaid a previous loan used in her farm work. Bernandita is now preparing for a new planting season, and is requesting a new  loan to buy fertilizer and seeds. In the future, she wants to improve her farm as well as the general living conditions of her entire family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds

loans.name: Rene

texts.es:
El socio Rene se dedica al negocio de transporte, el socio tiene un carros que realiza servicio urbano, el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m,el socio ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño del socio es comprar un carro nuevo. El socio solicita el crédito para comprar llantas para su carro.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Rene has a transportation business.  He has a car that he uses to provide urban taxi services.  He works from 8am until 10pm.  Rene has had this business for a number of years, and it is doing very well.  He dreams of buying a new car.  

Rene is requesting a loan to buy tires for his car.  He is happy to be getting this loan, and promises to comply with the payment terms.

loans.use: to buy tires for his car

loans.name: Dagoberto

texts.es: Dagoberto, tiene la edad  de 53 años, está casado, vive con sus hijos y esposa, los cuales son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de unos pollos para el engorde. La idea es aprovechar  las buenas condiciones del lugar donde vive para el desarrollo de la actividad además de poder vender los animales una vez gordos a los miembros de la comunidad y así no invertir en transporte y poderlos comercializar más frescos debido a la cercanía de los consumidores.  Con esta compra podrá desarrollar una actividad más, y a la vez tener un ahorro que le permitirá ir teniendo más animales e invertir más en el negocio.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Dagoberto, 53 years old, is married and lives with his children and wife, who are his first priority. With the loan, he plans to purchase some chickens to fatten. The idea is to take advantage of the good conditions of the place where he lives and to develop the activity in addition to being able to sell the animals, once they are fat, to members of the community. In this way, he will not have to pay for transportation and will be able to sell them fresher due to the proximity of the consumers. With this purchase, he will be able to develop the activity more and at the same time be able to have savings which will allow him to get more animals and invest more in the business. This is the first loan he has gotten from FUDECOSUR. He has not had previous loans with state banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered him a loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase chickens to fatten

loans.name: Rosie

texts.en: Rosie is 23 years old, married and the mother of one child. She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines, and is requesting a loan for PHP 5,500 through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies. She has earned a living by farming rice for the last three years and also earns additional income by running a general store. Rosie is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream, which is to secure the future of her family by building and expanding her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to plant chinese mamon fruit.

loans.name: Walter

texts.en: Walter is a twenty-five-year-old male. He deals in hardware in a business along a busy street in Masindi. Walter started his business to earn a living. He sells his products to the general public. He wants a loan to buy hardware material like metal and cement to sell. Walter wishes to have a well-stocked permanent business. However, he faces challenges of competition and high license fees.

loans.use: to buy hardware materials like metal and cement to sell.

loans.name: Jovelyn

texts.en:
Jovelyn is twenty years old and married.

Jovelyn works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5,500 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Jovelyn has borrowed and repaid three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for two years and also earns an income from raising livestock.

Jovelyn aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Carlos Antonio

texts.es: Carlos Antonio, tiene la edad  de 23 años, está soltero, vive con sus  padres y hermanos  que son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra alimento para el engorde de cerdos y con buenas condiciones para el desarrollo y producción de carne.  La idea es también aprovechar  la disponibilidad de alimentos de complemento que cuenta en la finca y el espacio que tiene y las buenas condiciones de ubicación del chiquero  para los cerdos. Además de obtener unos cerdos de buena calidad que a corto plazo puedan estar gordos y de buena calidad. Con esta compra podrá desarrollar la actividad, y a la vez tener un ahorro que le permitirá ir teniendo más animales e invertir más en el proyecto y a la vez darle más ingresos económicos a su familia.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Carlos Antonio, 23 years old, is single and lives with his parents and siblings who are his first priority. With the loan, he plans to purchase pig feed to fatten the pigs and give them good conditions for the development and production of meat. The idea is to take advantage of the availability of the extra food that the farm has and the space it has, as well as the good conditions of the location of the pigsty. In addition to getting good-quality pigs that can become fat and of good quality in the short term, with this purchase, he could develop the activity and also have some savings that will allow him to have more animals and invest more in the project at the same time as providing more income for his family. This is the first loan that he has gotten from FUDECOSUR. He has not had any previous loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered him a loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase pigs to fatten.

loans.name: Pulikeriya

texts.en: Pulikeria is a hardworking Ugandan widow who is 47 years old and lives in Kagadi. She has two children who are 8 and 12 years old. Both attend school. Since 2010, she has earned a living by selling pancakes and by farming. Her goal for the future is to buy land despite her current lack of adequate capital.  Pulikeria is requesting for a loan to buy cassava flour, maize flour and cooking oil to sell.

loans.use: to buy cassava flour, maize flour and cooking oil to sell.

loans.name: Editha

texts.en: Editha earns a living by running a bakery with help from her husband, who is a baker. For the last four years, she has earned a good income and been able to give her family a good life. She always find ways to secure extra business, and used a previous loan from GDMPC to buy ingredients. She succeeded in repaying this loan and improving her bakery. Editha is requesting a new loan to buy more ingredients to make more bread and pastries. Her goal is to improve her family's life.

loans.use: to buy more ingredients

loans.name: Wilma

texts.en: Wilma has been growing and harvesting rice to sell in town and has had this business for more than twelve years. This is the primary source of income for the family. With her generated income, she was able to repay her previous loan used for farming inputs successfully. Wilma took a new loan recently to purchase fertilizer and organic pesticides. She is planning to expand her farm, hoping it will flourish and enable her to improve her children's lives.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and organic pesticides.

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline is a resident of Batasan, Philippines. She previously accessed a 12,000 PHP loan that she used to purchase more quantities and varieties of grocery items and products needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help for her children’s education and in their personal, household and business expenditures.

Evangeline owns a variety store. This is a small store that can be owned by anyone in the community and the store is just connected to or just inside their houses. This is where you can buy a sachet of shampoo or conditioner, a bar of soap, a Php5-worth of cooking oil, or an egg and others. She gets her products from a wholesaler at a lower price and then she will sell it per piece for a higher price to have a profit. Her regular customers are her neighbors, passerby and the people in the community. She earns PHP 300 a day.

To be able to expand her inventory, she is requesting another PHP 10,000. She will use the loan to buy groceries, toiletries and beverages to expand her product inventory. This loan will be a great help for her to add more products to her store.

Evangeline hopes for her business to earn more profit and she desires to be successful someday. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Rosemary

texts.en: Rosemary is a 45-year-old hardworking widow who lives in Kagadi, Uganda with her three children, who are 20,18 and 16 years old. One of her children is still in school, and since 2008 she has earned a living by operating a retail store. Because she is her family's only breadwinner, Rosemary hopes to grow this business despite the challenge of inadequate capital. She is requesting this loan to buy salt, tomatoes, matches, and cooking oil to sell to her customers.

loans.use: to buy salt, tomatoes, matches, and cooking oil to resell.

loans.name: Manuel

texts.es: Manuel, tiene la edad  de 67 años, está casado, vive con su esposa, la cual es su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de un arado para realizar la mecanización del terreno y así mejorar las condiciones del terreno para hacer la siembra de diferentes cultivos, y así poder mejorar la calidad de los trabajos,  y aprovechar el conocimiento adquirido en capacitaciones y poder tener ingresos económicos para seguir invirtiendo en la compra de equipo y otras herramientas, y  también lograr un mejor acabado a los trabajos, además de aumentar la cantidad y calidad de los mismos. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Manuel, 67 years old, is married and lives with his wife, who is his first priority. With the loan, he plans to purchase a plow to mechanically prepare the soil, and so to improve the condition of the land to sow different crops and improve the quality of his work.
