He also plans to take advantage of the knowledge acquired in training and to have income to continue investing in the purchase of equipment and other tools. He also will be able to have better results from his work, in addition to increasing the quantity and quality. This is the first loan that he has gotten from FUDECOSUR. He has not had previous loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered him a loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase a plow to mechanize his farming

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is 49 years old and married with four children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Evelyn is borrowing PHP 5,000 through NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Evelyn has been raising pigs for five years and also earns additional income from a general store.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for her coffee crops

loans.name: Savuth Chen's Group

texts.en: Savuth’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Savuth makes a living cultivating rice with her family and doing extra work as a farm laborer to support her family. Families in their village do not ave access to piped water or a regular supply of safe, clean drinking water. Between them, the members in Savuth’s group have 7 young children, who are vulnerable to getting sick as a result of drinking dirty, contaminated water. Having a water filter at home will help each of member of the group to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water to their families

loans.name: Sreynoy Nin's Group

texts.en:
Sreynoy’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Sreynoy’s family make a living cultivating rice, she also works as a laborer in a garment factory to make extra money to support her family. 
In their village there is no piped water or reliable well. Between them, the members in Sreynoy’s group have 4 young children who are vulnerable to getting sick as a result of drinking dirty, contaminated water. Having a water filter at home will help each member of the group to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water to their families

loans.name: Than Chum's Group

texts.en: Than’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Than makes a living cultivating rice with her family and doing extra work as a farm laborer to support her family. Families in their village do not ave access to piped water or a regular supply of safe, clean drinking water. Between them, the members in Than’s group have 2 young children, who are vulnerable to getting sick as a result of drinking dirty, contaminated water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water to their families

loans.name: Sreang Sor's Group

texts.en: Sreng’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Sreang makes a living cultivating rice with her family and  doing extra work as a farm laborer to support her family. In their village there is no piped water or reliable well. Between them, the members in Sreang’s group have 4 young children - who are vulnerable to getting sick as a result of drinking dirty, contaminated water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water to their families

loans.name: Mebon-1002 Group

texts.en: Ouk’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Ouk makes a living cultivating rice and doing extra work as a farm laborer to support her family. In their village there is no piped or reliable, safe drinking water. Between them, the members in Ouk’s group have 3 young children who are vulnerable to getting sick as a result of drinking dirty, contaminated water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water to their families

loans.name: Prey Sotun-1001 Group

texts.en: Phal’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Phal’s family make a living cultivating rice, she also works as a garment worker to make extra money for her family. In their village there is no piped water or reliable well. Between them, the members in Phal’s group have 2 young children – who frequently get sick as a result of drinking dirty, contaminated water. Having a water filter at home will help each member of the group to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water to their families

loans.name: Prey Sotun-1002 Group

texts.en: Nak’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Nak’s family make a living cultivating rice and she also works as a farm laborer to make extra money for her family. Families in their village do not ave access to piped water or a regular supply of safe, clean drinking water. Between them, the members in Nak’s group have 3 young children – who are vulnerable to getting sick as a result of drinking dirty, contaminated water. Having a water filter at home will help both of these women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water to their families

loans.name: Sokha Chhum's Group

texts.en: Sokha’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Sokha’s family make a living cultivating rice and his son also works as a farm laborer to make extra money for his family. In their village there is no piped  or regular supply of clean, safe water. Between them, the members in Sokha’s group have 6 young children who are vulnerable to getting sick as a result of drinking dirty, contaminated water. Having a water filter at home will help each member of the group to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water to their families

Nat makes a living cultivating rice with her family and her son also does extra work as a farm laborer to support the family. In their village there is no access to safe drinking water. Between them, the members in Nat’s group have 5 young children who are vulnerable to getting sick as a result of drinking dirty, contaminated water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses.

loans.use: To enable each member of the group to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water to their families

loans.name: Yoeun Chhan's Group

texts.en: Yoeun’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Yoeun makes a living cultivating rice with her family and selling prahok (a locally produced, fermented fish paste that is widely used in Cambodian cuisine) to support her family. In her village there is no access to reliable, safe drinking water. The women in Yoeun's group have 2 young children – who are vulnerable to getting sick as a result of drinking dirty, contaminated water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses.

loans.use: To enable each member of the group to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water to their families

loans.name: Narin Pum's Group

texts.en: Narin’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Narin makes a living cultivating rice and also does extra work as a taxi driver to support her family. In their village there is no piped water or reliable well. Between them, the members in Narin’s group have 6 young children who frequently get sick as a result of drinking dirty, contaminated water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To enable each member of the group to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water to their families

Savan makes a living cultivating rice with her family and her son does extra work as a farm laborer to support the family. In their village there is no piped or reliable, safe water. Between them, the members in Savan’s group have 14 children who are vulnerable to getting sick as a result of drinking dirty, contaminated water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water to their families

In their village there is no piped or reliable, safe drinking water. Between them, the members in Heang’s group have 3 young children who are vulnerable to getting sick as a result of drinking dirty, contaminated water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water to their families

In their village there is no piped  or reliable drinking water. Between them, the two members of Y’s group have 4 young children who are vulnerable to getting sick as a result of drinking dirty, contaminated water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses.

loans.use: To enable each member of the group to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water to their families

texts.en: Kheng’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Kheng makes a living cultivating rice  and doing extra work as a farm laborer to support her family. In their village there is no piped or reliable drinking water source. Between them, the members in Kheng’s group have 4 young children - who are vulnerable to getting sick as a result of drinking dirty, contaminated water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses.

loans.use: To enable each member of the group to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water to their families

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase clothing and shoes to sell wholesale.

loans.name: Celia

texts.es:
La socia  Celia se dedica al negocio de venta de comida,la socia tiene un restaurat, la socia realiza diferentes platos como pollo al horno, sopas y saltados de carne, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un restaurant. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz, verduras y pollo.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member Celia is engaged in the business of selling food. She has a restaurant, and she prepares various dishes such as roasted chicken, soup, and stir-fried beef, working from 8:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m. 

She has been in this business for 8 years now, and it is going very well for her. Having a restaurant has been her dream, and she is requesting a loan to purchase cooking ingredients such as rice, vegetables, and chicken.

The member is happy about the loan and she is committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to purchase cooking ingredients such as rice, vegetables, and chicken.

loans.name: Alexander

texts.es:
Alexander es un joven luchador de 23 años que vio la oportunidad de comprar queso en su vereda y posteriormente comercializarlo en el pueblo a muy buen precio. Esta actividad la vine ejerciendo desde hace algún tiempo y le ha permitido tener una mediana calidad de vida al lado de su esposa.
El compra los quesos al por mayor, los transporta en una motocicleta de su propiedad y por último los vende en el municipio por encargo.
El solicita el préstamo para comprar una gran cantidad de producto ya que se lo dejan más económico si lo compra en mayor volumen, esto le permitirá obtener más utilidades que se verán reflejadas en el aumento de sus ingresos.
Es un joven trabajado y pujante que lo único que quiere es salir adelante y tener una gran comercializadora de queso bien consolidada y generar empleo.
texts.en:
Alexander is young and tenacious, just 23 years old. He saw an opportunity to purchase cheese in his neighborhood and then sell it in town at an excellent price. Alexander has been buying and selling cheese for some time now, and he and his wife have achieved a decent quality of life. He purchases cheeses wholesale, then delivers them on his motorcycle to customers who have placed orders.  

Alexander is applying for a loan in order to purchase a large quantity of cheese. His costs go down when he purchases greater volume, increasing his profits and income. Alexander is young and energetic, very focused on improving his situation. He is determined to become a successful cheese vendor who can provide jobs to others.

loans.use: to purchase a greater volume of cheese to sell.

loans.name: Karoli

texts.en: Karoli is a Ugandan, hard-working, married man aged 38 with eight children aged 18 to 4 years, and seven attend school. He lives in Kagadi where he has been dealing in alcohol production since 2006 alongside farming and produce selling to educate his children. He hopes to buy a plot despite the hardships of inadequate capital and high transportation costs. Karoli is requesting a loan to buy more jerry cans of alcohol for resale.

loans.use: to buy more jerry cans of alcohol for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta de 20 años de edad vive en casa alquilada con sus padres y su hermana, ella posee un puesto de venta de ropa ubicado en el mercado que se encuentra cerca de su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela por la variedad de prendas de vestir y los buenos precios, con lo q obtiene de sus ventas ayuda en los gastos de su casa, la clienta está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas ropa por mayor para damas y caballeros, para  continuar con sus ventas y así generar mejores ingresos para tener junto con su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
The client is 20 years old and she lives in a rented house with her parents and her sister. 

She has a clothing stall in the market near her place of residence. She has a lot of customers because of her variety of clothing items and her good prices, and she helps with the household expenses with the earnings from her sales.

She is requesting a loan for the purchase of more wholesale clothing for women and men, in order to continue with her sales. In this way she will generate better earnings in order to have a better quality of life for herself and her family.

loans.use: to purchase more wholesale clothing for women and men.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente vive en casa de un familiar con su compañera de vida y su hija, el se dedica a la venta de yinas (sandalias) su negocio lo tiene ubicado en el mercado que se encuentra cerca de su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela por la variedad y calidad de los productos y por los buenos precios, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el cliente esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de yinas (sandalias) por mayor para poder seguir con su negocio y así poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: This borrower lives in the home of a family member, with his life partner and his daughter. He works selling sandals. His business is located in the market which is close to his residence. He has many customers, thanks to the quality and variety of his products and his good prices. With the proceeds from his sales, he is able to cover some household expenses. He is requesting a loan to buy sandals on a wholesale basis, so that he can continue with his business and thus provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy sandals on a wholesale basis.

loans.name: Crisanta

texts.en: Crisanta has her own business, a small sari-sari store which is her main source of income. In order to sustain her business, she needs more capital to buy additional grocery goods to sell. She wants to improve and expand her business. With her current loan, she was able to purchase more products and make her store more attractive to the consumers, and it contributed more income. In the future, she wants to have a better life with her family.

loans.use: to buy additional grocery goods to sell.

loans.name: Sheila Marie

texts.en:
Sheila Marie works hard to support her family. Sheila Marie is married and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Sheila Marie requested a PHP 30000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell in her general store.

Sheila Marie has been in this business for 4 years now, and also earns additional income from buying and selling herbal products.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her general store business.

In the future, Sheila Marie would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Damyano

texts.en: Damyano is a 37-year-old married, honest, and hard-working Ugandan man living in Kagadi with eight children aged between 16 to 4 years, and seven attend school. He has been selling agricultural seeds since 2001. He hopes to build a permanent commercial house, even with inadequate capital and seasonal changes. Damyano intends to use the loan to buy seeds of cabbage, tomatoes, and maize to sell.

loans.use: to buy seeds of cabbage, tomatoes, and maize to sell.

loans.name: Ravshan

texts.ru:
Равшан жизнерадостный и трудолюбивый мужчина в возрасте 56 лет. Он женат и имеет двоих детей. Он обратился в Арванд впервые, когда узнал, что есть возможность получить финансовую поддержку. Сам Равшан живёт со своей семьёй в сельской местности. Он не имеет высшего образования, так как не было возможности учиться в Университете из-за финансовых трудностей в семье. Жена Равшана также не имеет образования и является домохозяйкой, она занимается домашними делами и воспитанием детей. 

Чтобы иметь доход на пропитание, Равшан занимается своим бизнесом. Он занимается откормом и продажей крупного рогатого скота. Также Равшан подрабатывает мастером. От данного бизнеса он получает хороший доход. Жена также помогает Равшану в его деле, она продаёт молоко, полученное от скота. Сейчас Равшан хочет увеличить количество скота для расширения своего бизнеса. Поэтому он обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку скота. Равшан очень надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Ravshan is a cheerful and hardworking 56 year old man. He is married and has two children. He came to Arvand initially when he found out about the possibility of receiving financial support. Ravshan himself lives with his family in a rural area. He doesn't have a higher education because the family's difficult financial situation kept him from being able to attend a university. Ravshan's wife doesn't have a higher education either. As a housewife she takes care of the house and raises the children. 

To earn a living Ravshan runs his own business feeding and selling cattle. He also works on the side as a contractor. He earns a good income from his business. His wife helps with the work. She sells milk from the cows. Now Ravshan wants to expand his herd and his business. For that reason he came to Arvand, wanting to get a loan to buy cattle. Ravshan is hoping for a good outcome, and thanks Arvand in advance for the support.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Anorboy

texts.ru:
Анорбой жизнерадостный и трудолюбивый мужчина  в возрасте 48 лет. Он женат и имеет двоих детей. Он обратился в Арванд впервые, когда узнал, что есть возможность получить финансовую поддержку. Сам Анорбой живёт со своей семьёй в сельской местности. Он не имеет высшего образования, так как не было возможности учиться в Университете из-за финансовых трудностей в семье. Жена Анорбоя также не имеет образования и является домохозяйкой, она занимается домашними делами и воспитанием детей.

Чтобы иметь доход на пропитание, Анорбой занимается своим бизнесом. Он занимается откормом и продажей крупного рогатого скота. Также Анорбой подрабатывает мастером в местной мастерской. От данного бизнеса он получает хороший доход. Жена также помогает Анорбою в его деле, она продаёт молоко, полученное от скота.  Сейчас Анорбой хочет увеличить количество скота для расширения своего бизнеса. Поэтому он обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку скота. Анорбой очень надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Anorboy is a cheerful and hardworking 48 year old man. He has two children. He came to Arvand when he found out about the possibility of receiving financial support. Anorboy lives with his family in a rural area. He does not have a higher education because his family's financial difficulties made it impossible for him to attend university. Anorboy's wife doesn't have a higher education either, and takes care of the house and children as a housewife. To earn an income Anorboy runs his own business feeding and selling cattle. Anorboy also works on the side as a skilled worker at a local workshop. His business earns him a good income. His wife also helps with the work and sells milk from the cows. Now Anorboy wants to expand his herd and business, so he came to Arvand to ask for a loan to buy cattle. Anorboy hopes for a good outcome and thanks Arvand in advance for the support.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Nalyn

texts.en:
Nalyn is a married woman with five children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Nalyn is 33 years old, and has two children who are currently in school.

Nalyn has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines. Nalyn requested a PHP 12000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase spare parts and gasoline for her motorcycle.

Nalyn has been in this business for 2 years. In the future, Nalyn would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts and gasoline for her motorcycle.

loans.name: Dilovar

texts.ru:
Диловар позитивная и трудолюбивая женщина в возрасте 34 лет. Она замужем и имеет четверых детей. Живёт она в небольшом сельском посёлке. С детства Диловар мечтала стать образованной девушкой, получить высшее образование и иметь хорошую работу. Но в её жизни так сложились обстоятельства, что она не смогла получить высшего образования из-за финансовой недостаточности в семье. Сразу после окончания средней школы Диловар выдали замуж. И так она стала домохозяйкой. Но, даже находясь постоянно  дома,  она никогда не сидит без дела. Диловар вместе с мужем стараются делать всё возможное, чтобы обеспечивать своих детей всем необходимым.

Для того, чтобы иметь постоянный доход на пропитание ШДиловар вместе со своим мужем начали свой бизнес. Они занимаются животноводством. Диловар выращивает скот, затем продаёт полученное от скота мясо и молоко. От этого бизнеса она получает хороший доход. Муж Диловар также работает в местной мастерской и  его работа приносит дополнительный доход в семью. Их совместного дохода хватает на проживание среднего уровня. И пока у них недостаточно средств, чтобы покрывать все имеющиеся нужды. В данный момент Диловар с мужем хотят купить ещё несколько голов скота для откармливания. Поэтому она обратилась в Арванд и хочет взять кредит на покупку скота. Диловар заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку, вследствие которой  улучшится качество жизни её семьи.
texts.en: Dilovar is an optimistic and hardworking 34 year old woman. She is married and has four children. She lives in a small rural town. Since childhood Dilovar dreamed of becoming an educated woman, earning a higher education and having a good job. But her life didn't turn out that way; her family's financial hardships kept her from being able to attend a university. She married immediately after finishing high school, and thus became a housewife. But even being at home all the time she is never idle. Dilovar and her husband do everything to provide their children with what they need. In order to earn a stable income, Dilovar and her husband started their own business, practicing animal husbandry. Dilovar raises the animals and then sells their meat and milk. She receives a good income from the business. Dilovar's husband also works in a local workshop and earns additional income for the family. Their incomes together are enough to support the family at an average level, but they still don't have enough resources to cover all needs. Currently Dilovar and her husband want to buy a few more cattle for feeding. To do this she came to Arvand, wanting a loan for purchase of the animals. Dilovar thanks Arvand in advance for the support, which will lead to improvements in her family's quality of life.

loans.use: purchase livestock

loans.name: Lorenzo Pedro

texts.es: Lorenzo de 30 años de edad es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable quien vive junto a sus dos hijos y su esposa. Lorenzo se dedica a la pesca artesanal, contando con una pequeña lancha y algunas redes para obtener mariscos. Él se ha dedicado prácticamente toda su vida a esta actividad, la cual incluso ahora le permite salir adelante. Lorenzo  solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de más redes para pescar, también anzuelos y otros instrumentos necesarios para realizar la pesca diariamente. Lorenzo desea darles una mejor vida a sus hijos en donde puedan contar con todo lo necesario sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Lorenzo, age 30, is a very hard-working and responsible person.  He lives with his two children and his wife.  Lorenzo is a small scale fisherman.  He has a small boat and some nets to catch seafood.  He has devoted practically his entire life to this business activity.  It has allowed him, even now, to get ahead.

Lorenzo is requesting a loan from Integral.  With the loan he will be able to have the money needed to buy more fishing nets, fishing hooks, and other instruments needed to fish daily.  Lorenzo wishes to give his children a better life where they are able to have everything they need without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy more fishing nets, fishing hooks, and other instruments.

loans.name: Maria Francisca

texts.es: Maria de 60 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con su nieta y su hijo quien trabaja como empleado, ella posee una negocio de venta de refrescos, agua, gaseosa, jugos, etc. ubicado en su lugar de residencia, tiene mucha clientela ya que es un producto muy vendible y a buenos precios, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de su hijo, logra salir adelante con los gasto del hogar, Maria está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas productos por mayor para continuar con sus ventas y así poder tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su familia.
texts.en:
Maria, age 60, is a single mother.  She lives in her own house with her granddaughter and her son, who works as an employee.  She has a business selling refreshments, water, soft drinks, and juices, etc.  Her business is located at her house.  She has a lot of clientele because it is a very marketable product at a good price.  With what she gets from her sales, and with the help of her son, she manages to get ahead with the household expenses.

Maria is requesting a loan to buy more products wholesale in order to continue with her sales.  This way she will be able to have a better quality of live together with her family.

loans.use: to buy more products like refreshments, water, soft drinks, and juices, etc. wholesale.

loans.name: Jose Arnoldo

texts.es: Jose de 31 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida y sus cuatro hijos, desde hace 7 años se dedica a la pesca artesanal y es así como ha logrado sacar adelante a su familia, cuenta con una lacha y algunas redes para pescar, Jose es un hombre muy trabajador y responsable con su familia y es por esa razón que ha decido solicitar un crédito a INTEGRAL para poder comprar trasmayos y redes para continuar con su pesca ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo e ingresos y así poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Jose is 31 years old and lives in his own home with his life partner and their four children.  For the past seven years he has worked as a traditional fisherman and that is how he has been able to help his family get ahead.  He has a small boat and some nets for fishing.  Jose is a very hard-working and responsible man with his family and for this reason he has decided to ask for a loan from Kiva partner INTEGRAL in order to be able to purchase better traditional fish traps (trasmallos) and nets in order to continue with his fishing. This is the only source of income and work and it will allow him to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase better traditional fish traps (trasmallos) and nets

loans.name: Azucena

texts.en:
Azucena is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business selling ready-to-wear clothing in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 6,000 through NWTF in order to purchase more blouses, pants and other ready-to-wear clothing.

Azucena has been in this business for five years. She earns additonal income from farming rice and corn.

Azucena has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more blouses, pants and other ready-to-wear clothing.

loans.name: Makhfirat

texts.ru:
Махфират молодая, но уже замужняя женщина. Она рано вышла замуж и родила двоих детей. У нее маленькая дочь и сын. Махфират работает в дехканском хозяйстве, она в течение 6 лет является членом этого хозяйства. Четыре семей живут в одном большом хозяйстве. Их 15 человек. Они занимаются выращиванием сельскохозяйственных культур.
Махфират как и все члены хозяйства готовится к очередным посевам. Она нуждается в кредите, чтобы приобрести семена, минеральные удобрения и топлива. Махифират планирует в дальнейшем увеличить разновидность выращиваемых культур. Сейчас она надеется на финансовую поддержку, чтобы продолжить деятельность.
texts.en: Makhfirat is young but already married. She married early and had two children, a son and a daughter. Makhfirat works on a communal farm, which she has been a member of for six years. Four families, a total of 15 people, live on one large property. She is a farmer. Makhfirat like all members is getting ready for planting. She needs a loan to buy seeds, fertilizer, and fuel. Makhfirat plans to expand her diversity of crops. She is hoping for a loan to continue her work.

loans.use: To buy seeds, fertilizer, and fuel

loans.name: Jabar

texts.ru:
Чабар жизнерадостный и трудолюбивый мужчина  в возрасте 56 лет. Он женат и имеет 3-их детей. Он обратился в Арванд впервые, когда узнал, что есть возможность получить финансовую поддержку.  Сам Чабар живёт со своей семьёй в сельской местности. Он не имеет высшего образования, так как не было возможности учиться в Университете из-за финансовых трудностей в семье. Жена Чабара, Латофат также не имеет образования и является домохозяйкой, она занимается домашними делами и воспитанием детей.

Чтобы иметь доход на пропитание, Чабар занимается своим бизнесом. Он занимается откормом и продажей крупного рогатого скота. От данного дела он получает хороший доход. Этим самым Чабар может удовлетворять все нужды своей семьи.  Жена также помогает Чабару в его деле, она продаёт молоко, полученное от скота.  Сейчас Чабар хочет увеличить количество скота для расширения своего бизнеса. Поэтому он обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку скота. Чабар очень надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Jabar is a joyful and hardworking 65 year old man. He is married and has three children. He first contacted Arvand when he learned of the possibility of receiving financial assistance. Jabar lives with his family in a rural area. He doesn't have a higher education because his family's financial difficulties kept him from being able to attend university. Jabar's wife, Latofat also lacks a higher education, and is a housewife. She takes care of the house and raises the children. To earn a living Jabar runs his own business raising and selling cattle. His work earns him a good income and allows him to provide for the family's needs. His wife also helps with the work: she sells milk from the cows. Now Jabar wants to expand the herd and his business. To do this he came to Arvand for a loan to buy cattle. He hopes for a good result and thanks Arvand in advance for the support.

loans.use: purchase cattle

loans.name: Hugo Antonio

texts.es: Hugo de 34 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijas, desde hace varios años el cliente se dedica a la crianza de ganado y a la agricultura, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, Hugo está solicitando un crédito para la compra de ganado, concentrado y vitaminas y así poder continuar con la crianza para generar mejores ingresos y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Hugo is thirty four years old, he lives in his own house with his wife and their two children. For several years he has worked in agriculture and raising cattle, selling his products in different markets found close to his home. He is asking for a loan to buy cattle, feed and vitamins to be able to continue with his business, to generate a better income and give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy cattle, feed and vitamins.

loans.name: Ernesto Porfirio

texts.es: Ernesto 50 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida y sus hijos, el tiene un negocio de venta de ropa, gorras, billeteras y demás productos está ubicado cerca de su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Ernesto está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería por mayor para continuar con sus ventas y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ernesto is 50 years old, and lives in his own home with his partner and children. He has a business selling clothing, hats, wallets and other items located near where he lives. He is able to pay some of his household expenses with the income from his sales.

Ernesto is requesting a loan to buy more wholesale merchandise to keep selling his goods and give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more wholesale merchandise such as clothing, hats, wallets, etc.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a 46-year-old honest woman living in Kagadi, Uganda with two children, aged 21 and 17 years. Both attend school. She has been operating a retail shop since 2011 to provide necessities to her family and earns from farming to supplement her income. 

She hopes to educate her children, though is challenged by limited capital. Mary is requesting a loan to add stock like bread and cakes for selling.

loans.use: to add stock like bread and cakes for selling.

loans.name: Abel Antonio

texts.es: Abel de 47 años de edad se dedica desde hace varios años a la agricultura su principal siembra es el maíz y frijol, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Abel está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografía para poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Abel, aged 47, has dedicated himself to agriculture for various years.  His principal crops are corn and beans. He sell his production in the different markets to be found near his place of residence. With what he earns from these sales, he manages to cover some of his household expenses.

Abel is requesting a loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers, manure, plague controls, etc., and to improve the land pictured in the photograph, in order to offer his family a  better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, manure, plague controls, etc., and to improve his farm land.

loans.name: Juan Gilberto

texts.es: Juan de 47 años de edad vive en casa propia con su familia, el se dedica al cultivo de maíz y maicillo, el desea continuar con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos, pero no posee de suficiente capital para poder para poder comprar semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y poder mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografía para poder realizar su siembra, por esa razón solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito para poder comprar lo dicho y así obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Juan is 47 years old and lives in his own home with his family. He makes a living growing corn and sorghum. He wants to keep working since it is his only source of income, but he doesn't have enough capital to buy seeds, fertilisers, compost, pest control, herbicide, etc. or to improve the land shown in the photograph so that he can sew crops. 

This is why he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy the above items and in this way, achieve greater profits to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilisers, compost, pest control, herbicide, etc. and to improve the land.

loans.name: Juan Roberto

texts.es: Juan de 51 años de edad se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años, su principal siembra es el maíz y el frijol, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la almacena en los graneros que muestra la fotografía para luego salir a comercializarlos, Juan está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y asi poder tener mejores ingresos para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Juan, 51 years of age, has been dedicated to agriculture for various years. His principal crops are corn and beans. When his harvest is ready, it is stored in the granaries shown in the photograph, to later go to market. 

Juan is requesting a loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers, manure, plague controls, etc. This will enable him to have a better income and to offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, manure, and plague controls, etc.

loans.name: Raul Alberto

texts.es:
Esta es la historia de Raúl, un hombre con gran capacidad para generar estrategias y brindar ideas de progreso.
Este simpático hombre es dueño de un negocio de venta de bebidas refrescantes tipo bolis, un producto con mucha acogida en el Municipio de Yarumal, Antioquia.
Trabaja con su esposa y otro familiar todos los días, es decir, es un negocio con gran capacidad para generar empleo.
El solicita un apoyo monetario para invertirlo en una motocicleta y realizar el transporte de sus productos de una manera mucho más eficiente, recortando el tiempo de entrega y satisfaciendo a sus clientes que en su mayoría son tiendas de barrio y escolares.
Al entregar su producto de una forma más rápida podrá generar mucho más utilidades para su negocio y su familia compuesta por su esposa y dos hijos.
texts.en:
This is the story of Raúl, a man with a great capacity for generating strategies and sharing ideas for progress.

This likable man is the owner of a business selling refreshing "Bolis"-type drinks [a brand of ice-pop], a very popular product in the municipality of Yarumal, Antioquia.

He works with his wife and another relative every day; in other words, it's a business with a great potential to generate jobs.  

He is requesting monetary support to invest in a motorcycle to transport his products in a much more efficient way, shortening delivery times and satisfying his customers, the majority of whom are neighborhood shops and schools. 

When he delivers his product more quickly, he will be able to generate more profits for his business and his family, composed of his wife and two children.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle to transport his product to his customers

loans.name: Fe

texts.en:
Fe is from the village of Garang, Tangub City. She is 55 years old, married and has three children. 

She has been planting and harvesting fruits and vegetables for sale. She also raises pigs for sale, and she earns additional income from this.  

Fe joined GDMPC recently and borrowed a new loan to buy organic fertilizer and seedlings. 

She wants to have a better living in the near future with her family.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer and seedlings.

loans.name: Catalina

texts.es: Catalina tiene 71 años de edad y vive en el distrito de Maranura de la provincia de La Convención, ella desde hace varios años atras pertenece al banco comunal "Santa Beatriz" de la Asociación Arariwa, ella se dedica a la agricultura y crianza de animales menores como cuyes, ella en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar      semillas y fertilizantes. Catalina agradece a todos los inversionistas por el préstamo y se compromete para pagar sus cuotas con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Catalina is 71 years old and lives in the district of Maranura, in the province of La Convención. For several years, she has belonged to Asociación Arariwa's "Santa Beatriz" communal bank. She earns her living in farming and by raising young animals, such as guinea pigs. 

At this time, Catalina needs the loan to purchase seeds and fertilizers. She is grateful to all the lenders for the loan, and she promises to make her loan payments very responsibly.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Etoile Group

texts.fr: Madame Nyota  est  responsable de l’association de crédit Etoile.  Femme d’une grande expérience, elle commença  le petit commerce à partir de fonds  reçu de son mari en 2001.  Elle est âgée de 39 ans, mère de 8 enfants scolarisés  et mariée à un chômeur.Le credit demandé va lui permettre d’acheter 5 bidons d'essence. Elle ambitionne améliorer son habitat et scolariser ses enfants. Elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien aux femmes à bas revenu.
texts.en: Mrs. Nyota is the leader of the Etoile ["Star"] borrowers' group. She has plenty of experience. She launched her vending business in 2001, with funds received from her husband. She is 39 years and has eight children, all in school. Her husband is unemployed. The requested loan will allow her to buy five  containers of fuel. Her goal is to improve her living condition and provide for her children's education. She thanks Hekima for its support of low-income women.

loans.use: to buy five containers of fuel.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.es: Samuel de 50 años de edad  vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, es responsable y trabajador, el se dedica a la mecánica de obra de banco (elaboración de estructuras metálicas: puertas, balcones, portones, techos) desde hace varios años, Samuel solicita el crédito para comprar más materiales como: hierro, metal, herramienta etc. ya que tiene mucha demanda porque hace un buen trabajo y con las ganancias que obtiene ha logrado sacar adelante a su familia y solventar los gastos que se le presentan, es por esa razón que solicita dicho crédito para continuar con su trabajo y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: 50-year-old Samuel lives in his own house with his family. He is responsible and hard-working. He has made a living as a bench mechanic (making metallic structures, such as doors, balconies, gates, and roofs) for several years. Samuel is requesting the loan in order to buy more materials, such as iron, metal, and tools since there is a lot of demand for his work because he does a good job. With the profits from his work he has managed to look after his family and settle the household expenses. For this reason, he is requesting the loan so he can continue with his work and give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more materials, such as iron, metal, and tools

loans.name: Jose David

texts.es: Jose de 61 años de edad es fotógrafo desde hace varios años ejerce esa actividad que le genera muy buenas ganancias, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, tiene mucha clientela por la calidad de las fotos y los buenos precios, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar los gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, Jose está solicitando un crédito para la compra de rollos, molduras, baterías, etc. y asi continuar con su trabajo y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: 61-year-old José has been a photographer for several years and it generates good profits for him. His business is located in his home. He has a large clientele due to the quality of his photos and his reasonable prices. He manages to settle the household expenses with the earnings from his work. He lives in his own house with his wife and two children. José is requesting a loan in order to buy rolls [of film], frames, batteries, and other supplies so he can continue with his work and give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy rolls [of film], frames, batteries, and other supplies

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, and tiles for building two bedrooms

loans.name: Pilika Pilika Group

texts.en:
Zakia is a mother of one son who is at school. She is aged in her late twenties. For three years now, Zakia has helped to support her family by managing a cafeteria selling breakfast with bites, lunch and dinners. She is also managing a shop selling dry food (rice, beans, sugar, maize flour, baking flour, etc). She does business from 6:00 a.m. to 11:00 p.m. daily and is able to make a good profit each month.

Zakia is requesting a first loan through Tujijenge Tanzania. She is applying for 700,000 TZS to be apportioned among Pilika Pilika, her two-member group. Pilika Pilika group members will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan. 

Zakia will use her portion of this loan to buy food inventory for her restaurant and shop. Her ambition is to greatly improve her business.

loans.use: to buy food inventory for her restaurant and shop.

loans.name: María Erlinda

texts.es: María tiene 61 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus cinco nietos de 6 años, 10 años, 15 años, 17 años y 21 años de edad. María se dedica a la confección de ropa de cama desde hace 14 años. Este oficio le ha permitido ganarse el sustento diario y mantener la economía de su familia. María habita en condiciones muy humildes junto a sus nietos y con el fin de mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un cuarto para lo cual necesita materiales como: lámina galvanizada, madera, cemento, ladrillo, arena y una puerta. Confía que de los ingresos que percibe de su negocio logrará cancelar las cuotas mensuales del crédito.
texts.en: María is 61 years old and lives in her own house together with her five grandchildren, aged 6, 10, 15, 17 and 21. María has worked for 14 years making bed linens. This profession has allowed her to earn her daily bread and support her family economically. María lives in very humble conditions together with her grandchildren. With the aim of improving their living conditions, she is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in constructing a room. For this she needs materials such as galvanized metal sheets, wood, cement, bricks, sand and a door. She is confident that with the income she receives from her business, she will succeed in making her monthly payments for the loan.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheets, wood, cement, bricks, sand and a door to build a room.

loans.name: Adelina

texts.en:
Adelina is 61 years old and married with nine children, one of whom is in school.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Adelina is borrowing PHP 7,000 through NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Adelina has been raising pigs for thirty years and also earns additional income from farming rice and from her general store.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream, to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Plaxeda

texts.en:
Plaxeda is a 46-year-old honest lady living in Kagadi, Uganda with five children, four of whom attend school. 

She has been dealing in textile cloth, tailoring and a retail shop since 1995 for the survival of her family. She has a dream of educating her children, despite the challenge of inadequate capital. 

Plaxeda is asking for a loan to buy textile cloth and school uniforms for selling.

loans.use: to buy textile cloth and school uniforms for selling.

loans.name: Lily Group

texts.en:
Phalkhohat is a married woman, 45 years old, who lives in a remote village in Manipur, India. She is the featured profile member pictured with her hand raised. She lives with her family of seven, including her husband, three sons and two daughters. She is very energetic, hardworking and enthusiastic and always devotes her time to get her family ahead. 

Phalkhohat has been doing a tea stall business with her husband in the village for the last five years to maintain her family. Initially, with the first loan from Kiva, she started a low-budget tea stall business in her house. She gained a little profit and with the second loan, she moved the tea stall to a nearby roadside where more people could reach easily. Gradually, with the third loan, she expanded her business and saved some money. 

Since it’s scant to manage her big family from her business alone, to add some extra income she added her savings, and with the fourth and fifth loans bought an auto-rickshaw, which makes them the first owner in their locality. She is very happy that her family’s property has increased and her burden has been lightened. 

She wanted to avail another loan from Kiva, which would be her sixth cycle; with this loan, Phalkhohat says she wants to start ginger farming in the village. 

She is considered as one of the successful clients by WSDS, too. She thanked Kiva and WSDS for the constant support and generosity towards her and the group.   

The other members of her group are doing vegetable vending, tea stall, running a grocery shop, etc.

loans.use: to buy ginger to start ginger farming.

loans.name: Hellen

texts.en:
Hellen is a very dedicated farmer living in Kisii, which is a very productive area in South Nyanza. She is a very hard-working farmer who grows vegetables and raises poultry, which are her main sources of income, and she has a small retail business where she sells some groceries, which she has been at for the past 13 years. His biggest challenge in farming is diseases affecting crops and livestock.

Hellen chose Juhudi Kilimo for this Kiva loan because they offer their loans at a low interest rate. With this loan, she will be able to purchase a dairy cow, which will produce milk for domestic use and for selling in the local market. This will boost her income and thus she will be able to take care of her children very well.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en: Francis is an honest married Ugandan man, aged 50 years, with seven children. He lives in Kagadi, where he has been selling timber since 1990 and farming; he owns lodges for extra income. He hopes to educate his children despite insufficient capital and high license fees on timber sellers. Francis is asking for a loan to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children.

loans.name: Erna

texts.en: As a married mother of two children, Erna works hard to support her family. She has a food-vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from selling eggs and farming rice. Erna is borrowing 6,000 PHP through NWTF in order to buy more ingredients for her food business. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream, to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy more ingredients for her food business.

loans.name: Melchora

texts.en:
Melchora, a mother of five children, helps her husband operate their own farm to make a living. For more than ten years, the couple has earned well to provide for the family. She has planned to improve their farm in order to send her children to school. 

Recently, Melchora took a new loan from GDMPC micro credit to purchase fertilizer to have a higher yield. In the future, she wants to provide a good education for her children and improve the general living situation of the entire family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer

loans.name: Teymur

texts.en:
Teymur is 34 years old. He is an IDP (Internally Displaced Person) from his home, which was in the city of Fuzuli, and now he is living in the Baku region with his lovely family. Teymur is married and has two children. One of his children is a 6-year-old boy who goes to pre-school; next year he will go to first grade. Another child was born in this year. His wife is a housewife who doesn’t earn an income. 

Three years ago, Teymur decided to open a shoes and bags store. To increase his business, he repaired the inside of the store a while ago. In order to repair the store's exterior now, he needs a loan in the amount of 1,200 AZN. Teymur hopes that with this loan he will finish the repair and his business will continue to get better. A year ago, he took a first loan from Kiva and paid back the loan in time. This is his second loan and Teymur says thanks to Kiva and lenders for everything.

loans.use: to repair the exterior of his store.

loans.name: Irma Cecilia

texts.es: Irma tiene 42 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus tres hijos de 19 años, 17 años y 15 años de edad. Irma trabaja en un taller de costura en el cual elabora variedad de prendas de vestir y de esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Irma solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un muro de retención en su vivienda para lo cual necesita materiales como: ladrillo, cemento, arena y hierro.
texts.en:
Irma is 42 years old and lives at home with her three children aged 19, 17 and 15 years of age.

Irma works as a seamstress in a workshop which produces a variety of clothing. This is how she earns a living and brings home income.

Irma is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in the construction of a retaining wall on her property for which she needs materials such as brick, cement, sand and rebar.

loans.use: to purchase brick, cement, sand and rebar to build a retaining wall.

loans.name: Sreyny

texts.en:
Sreyny is a resident of Samrong Torng district located in Kampong Speu province. She is a 24-year-old married woman. She is also a farmer, as are most of the villagers. The primary source of income for her family comes from farming activity. It earns her an average daily income of 27,700 KHR.

This is the first time that Sreyny is seeking for micro loan from Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. As a hard-working farmer who tries her best to support her family, she plans to use the loan money of 1,400,000 KHR to buy fertilizer for her cash-crop. Sreyny strongly believes that the loan from Kiva’s partner, VisionFund will enable her to uplift her family's lifestyle and live in better conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her cash-crop

location.town: Kampong Speu province, Samrong Torng district

loans.name: Luon

texts.en:
A resident of Samrong Torng district located in Kampong Speu province, Luon is a 62-year-old farmer. She is also a widow who has farmed for ages. The primary income source for Luon’s family comes from farming activity. However, as a widow who is working very hard to support her family, she can only earn an average of 22,300 KHR per day. 

This is the first time that Luon is seeking for micro loan from Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. She is applying for the loan amount of 1,400,000 KHR. With the loan money, she plans to use it to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farming business. Luon strongly believes that the loan from Kiva’s partner, VisionFund will enable her to uplift her family's condition with enough food to eat.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds

location.town: Kampong Speu province, Samrong Torng district

loans.name: Lim

texts.en:
Lim is a resident of Samrong Torng district located in Kampong Speu province. She is a 56-year-old widow who has two children dependent on her. Lim has been working as a farmer for ages in order to earn money to support her family. As a single working mother, she works very hard for her family. On average, Lim makes an income from the farming business of just 24,400 KHR per day.

This is the very first time that Lim is seeking a micro loan from Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Lim is applying for a loan of 500,000 KHR. With the loan, she plans to use it to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farming business. She optimistically hopes that the loan from Kiva’s partner, VisionFund will enable her to uplift her family's lifestyle. She also believes that it will allow her to have enough financial support to keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds

location.town: Kampong Speu province, Samrong Torng district

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is 38 years old. He is married and has been blessed with two children. He has been running his butcher shop for nine years. Samuel has three employees. He makes an estimated monthly income of 30,000 KES.
	
Samuel would like a loan of 20,000 KES with which he will be able to buy more livestock for slaughter and to sell in the butcher shop. He hopes that in the future he will have a successful business.

loans.use: to buy more livestock for slaughter and to sell in the butcher shop.

loans.name: Emmanuel

texts.en: Emmanuel is a 29-year-old hardworking, single man living in Kagadi, Uganda. He has been selling produce to support himself. He hopes to grow his business and enter into new market areas, but he is challenged by the poor road network that hinders delivery of his services to the customers on time.  Emmanuel intends to use the loan to buy maize and cassava for resale.

loans.use: to buy maize and cassava for resale.

loans.name: Katherine

texts.es:
La socia Katherine se dedica al negocio de guia de turismo,la socia tambien tiene un hospedaje,la socia por medio de este trbajo y de este negocio quieren salir adelante,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de hospedaje.La socia solicita el credito para comprar sabanas para el hotel.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Katherine has a business working as a tourism guide. She also offers lodging accommodations. Through this work and this business she wants to be successful; her dream is to expand her hotel business. The member seeks a loan to buy sheets for the hotel. Katherine is happy for the loan and promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy sheets for the hotel.

loans.name: Argelia

texts.es: Argelia tiene 60 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su hija quien ya es mayor de edad. Argelia posee una pequeña tienda en la cual comercializa variedad de productos de primera necesidad como: cereales, aceite, detergente, pan dulce, golosinas, etc. Este negocio es el que el que le permite ganarse la vida y mantener la economía de su hogar. Con el fin de mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales y dar mayor seguridad a su familia ha tomado la decisión de construir un tapial en la parte de trasera de su vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena, lamina y piedra.
texts.en: Argelia is 60 years old and lives in her own home with her grown daughter. Argelia has a small store where she sells a variety of basic needs products such as cereal, oil, detergent, pastry, candies, etc. This business permits her to earn a living and support her home. With the goal of construction a wall behind her home so she asked FUSAI for a loan to buy brick, cement, sand, laminate, and stone.

loans.use: to buy brick, cement, sand, laminate, and stone to construct a wall.

loans.name: Sally Leeset

texts.es:
La socia Sally Lesset se dedica al negocio de venta de muebles, la socia vende en las diferentes ferias, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 7 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de muebles. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar muebles.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Sally Lesset has a business selling furniture which she sells in different markets. She works from 8:00 AM until 6:00 PM. She has had this business for 7 years and it is going well. Her dream is to expand her furniture business. The member is happy for the loan and promises to make her loan payments.

loans.use: to buy furniture.

loans.name: Liseth Magaly

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “TRABAJADORAS DE HABASPATA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Vilcabamba, perteneciente a la provincia de La Convencion y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Lisetth Magaly se dedica al negocio de planes de seguridad,la socia hace mantenimiento en las diferentes calles de la ciudad,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es tener una tienda de abarrotes.La socia solicita el credito para uso personal para comprar un televisor para su casa.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Lisetth Magaly is a member of the Communal Bank “Trabajadoras de Habaspata” (Workers of Habaspata), which is located in the District of Vilcabamba in La Convencion Province, Department of Cusco. She has a safety plan business and performs maintenance on different streets of the city. Lisetth works from 8:00 A.M. to 6:00 P.M. She has been in this business for several years and is doing very well. Her dream is to have a grocery store.

Lisetth is requesting a loan for personal use in order to buy a television for her house. She is pleased with the loan and promises to complete the payments.

loans.use: to buy a television.

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es:
La socia Hilda se sigue dedicando al negocio de elaboración de pan, ella tiene una panaderia,la socia también se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de productos de belleza, la socia vende perfumes, cremas y lápiz labiales, la socia ya tiene varios años en estos negocios, el sueño de la socia es ampliar la panaderia.La socia solicita el crédito para comprar harina, azúcar y manteca para que prepare el pan.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Hilda's livelihood continues to be making bread.  She has a bakery and she also continues to devote time to selling beauty products.

She sells perfumes, creams and lipsticks.  She has several years experience in these businesses.  Her dream is to expand the bakery.  She is requesting a loan to buy flour, sugar and butter to prepare the bread.

She is happy for the loan and agrees to comply with the terms of the repayment.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar and butter to make bread.

loans.name: Tessie

texts.en: Tessie is a 59-year-old mother who engages in selling pork and chicken barbecue within the local community. Together with her husband, she aims to improve their living conditions in order to give their children a better future. To achieve their goal, Tessie wants to improve and strengthen her business to increase her income. Having inadequate capital, Tessie is asking for a loan of PHP10,000.00 to buy hot dogs, seasonings, pork and chicken barbecue for sale. Being a patient and industrious mother, she believes that she will make her business grow.

loans.use: to buy hot dogs, seasonings, pork and chicken barbecue for sale.

loans.name: Carolina

texts.en:
Carolina previously accessed a 50,000 PHP loan that she used to purchase additional stock of used-but-quality clothes. Her earnings were a big help for her child’s education and in their personal, household and business expenditures.

She would like to apply for another 50,000 PHP loan to buy more supplies to increase her product inventory. The more items she has on display and available on hand, the better. More items to sell will result in better profit. Her profits from the business will definitely help her to sustain her child’s education and daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Carolina hopes to earn more profit from her business and dreams for her daughter to finish her studies. She is active in attending the weekly fellowship*, as it helps a lot in learning from the Bible. Before becoming a member of CCT, Carolina never opened her Bible, but she does now, as it strengthens her spiritual life.

*All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for additional stock of used-but-quality clothes.

loans.name: Lydiah

texts.en:
Lydiah is 28 years old. She is married and has been blessed with three children. She has two adult dependents and has been farming in her area for the past six years.

She would like to expand her business by purchasing dry maize and beans to sell to clients in her area. She would like a loan of KES.20,000. Her estimated monthly income is KES.23,000.

She has successfully repaid all her previous loans. Through the expected profits, she will pay her current loan. In future, she dreams of building her own residential house.

loans.use: to buy dry maize and beans for sale.

loans.name: Enoch

texts.en:
Enoch is 41 years old. He is married and has been blessed with three children. He has been running his poultry business for five years. 

Enoch currently makes an estimated income of 19,000 KES. He would like a loan of 45,000 KES to buy more poultry to sell and feeds for the poultry. He has successfully repaid all of his previous loans, and he will expand the current business from the profit he makes. In the future, Enoch hopes to increase his profit.

loans.use: to buy more poultry and feeds for his business.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca previously accessed a 15,000 PHP loan which she utilized for the repair and maintenance of her room for rent.  Her profits were a big help in her personal, household and business expenditures. She also sells rice for additional income.

She would like to apply for another 22,000 PHP loan for the repair and maintenance of her room for rent. Her income from her business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Rebecca desires to own more room for rent and hopes that her family will always be happy and in good condition. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and draws strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay micro finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for the repair and maintenance of her room for rent.

loans.name: Lucena

texts.en:
Lucena works hard to support her family. Lucena is married and has a buy-and-sell rope business in the Philippines.

Lucena requested a PHP 17000 loan through NWTF to buy more bundles of rope to sell.

Lucena has been in this business for 10 years now.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

In the future, Lucena would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more bundles of rope to sell.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en: Stephen is a 35-year-old hardworking married man, living in Kagadi-Uganda. He has been operating a boutique and farming to generate extra income. He has a vision of expanding his business into a well stocked positioned boutique serving all men, women and children. Despite his desires, he faces a limitation of high transport costs. Stephen is asking for a loan to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Tupendane C Group

texts.en:
Mary, who is her early 30s, is married and has two sons and a daughter who are in school. For three years now, Mary has made her living by managing a mamalishe business. She takes a bus everyday to go to work, which is one hour away and starts at 4:00 a.m. Mary's business ends at 9:00 p.m. and she is able to make a good profit each month. 

This is not Mary's first loan through Tujijenge Tanzania. Previously, she was a customer of Tujijenge, but she stopped taking loans after her business performed badly. She is now asking for a loan that she will use to buy new business equipment such as chairs, plates, cooking pots, and tables. She used her previous loans to rent a new attractive business place. Mary made a profit and used it to cover part of the school fees and household expenses; she also saved for her future. Mary and her husband started building a house. Mary's ambition is to manage a hotel. 

She will share this loan with her loan group "Tupendane C," which totals four members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy new business equipment such as chairs, plates, cooking pots, and tables.

loans.name: Reat

texts.en:
Originally from a rural village of the Samlot district of Battambang province, Reat is 49 years old and married with one child who is dependent. She and her husband earn a living through farming rice, which they have been doing for years, and supplement the family's income by selling grocery items. These current businesses earn their family about 60,000KHR per day.

Nornn has been with VisionFund for three cycles. She successfully used the previous loans to better support her family and increase her family’s businesses. Now she is applying for another loan. She wants to use her loan to buy fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to grow her rice successfully and increase her current business to better her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland.

loans.name: Edna

texts.en:
Edna is 54 years old and married with seven children.

Edna works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Edna has borrowed and repaid six loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for four years and also earns an income from food vending.

Edna aspires to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Sem

texts.en:
Sem is 61 years old, and married with three children who are all dependent. One child is in school while another is too young for school. She lives in a rural village of Battambang province’s Samlot district. In order to support her family, she earns a living through farming rice which she has been doing for 27 years. With this current business, she can earn about 80,000 KHR per day.

Sem has been with VisionFund for seven cycles. She successfully used the previous loans to better support her family and expand her family’s business. Now she is applying for another loan. She wants to use her loan to buy fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to grow her rice successfully and increase her current business to better her family’s living condition and keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland

loans.name: Pheap

texts.en:
Pheap is 29 years old and married with two children who are all dependent and in school. She lives in a rural village of Battambang province’s Samlot district. In order to support her family, she and her husband earn a living through farming rice, which they have been doing for eight years. With this current business, she can earn about 40,000 KHR per day.

Pheap has been with VisionFund for five cycles. She successfully used the previous loan to better support her family and expand her family’s business. Now she is applying for another loan. She wants to use her loan to buy fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to grow her rice successfully and increase her current business to better her family’s living condition and keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland

loans.name: Nang

texts.en: Nang is a 62-year-old married woman. Currently she is residing in the Samrong Torng district of Kampong Speu province. Nang has been farming for a long time. She is also the mother of a ten-year-old son. As a hard-working mother, she is able to afford to put her son in the village school. Her primary income source is farming, generating an average daily amount of 28,100 KHR. Nang has been a borrower of Kiva’s partner VisionFund for sixth cycles and she has successfully repaid her past loans. In this seventh cycle, Nang is seeking a microloan of 2,000,000 KHR in order to buy fertilizers for her cash-crop. She strongly believes that this loan will enable her to improve her family's lifestyle and allow her to continue to keep her child in school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her cash-crop.

location.town: Kampong Speu province, Samrong Torng district

loans.name: Rum

texts.en:
Rum is aged 26 years, and married with a 3-year-old son. She lives in a rural village of Battambang province’s Samlot district. In order to support her family, she and her husband earn a living through farming rice which they have been doing for five years.

Rum has been with VisionFund for one cycle. She successfully used the previous loan to better support her family and increase her family’s business. Now she is applying for another loan. She wants to use her loan to buy fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to grow her rice successfully and increase her current business to better her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland.

loans.name: Siem

texts.en:
Originally from a rural village of the Kos Krolo district of Battambang province, Siem is 29 years old and married. In her family, there are five children, four of whom are attend school while another is too young for in school. She and her husband earn a living through farming rice which they have been doing for 10 years. 

This is the first microloan cycle for Siem. She wants to use her loan to buy fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to grow her rice successfully and increase her current business to better her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en:
Nenita owns and operates a general store, selling grocery goods in her village to make a living. She has been engaged in her business for eight years and earns well to sustain the business and provide for her family's needs.

Her previous loan used for the business was successfully repaid. Preparing for the next season, she took a new loan to purchase additional grocery goods to sell. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from her business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional products like canned goods, noodles, sugar and coffee.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new engine for a mixing cylinder that is in bad condition, and supplies to prepare his goods

loans.name: Pat

texts.en:
Pat is aged 55 years, and a widow. She lives in a rural village of Battambang province’s Samlot district. In order to support her family, she earns a living through farming rice which she has been doing for 12 years. With this current business, she can earn about 80,000KHR per day.

Pat has been with VisionFund for five cycles. She successfully used the previous loans to better support her family and increase her family’s business. Now she is applying for another loan. She wants to use her loan to buy fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to grow her rice successfully and increase her current business to better her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland.

loans.name: Christy

texts.en:
Christy, 28 years old, is married and has one child. She works hard to provide for her family. For the past 6 years, Christy has run a general store in the Philippines. She earns additional income from pig fattening.

Christy has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items such as seasonings, canned goods, detergent, soap, shampoo, soft drinks, noodles, etc. to sell. Christy has previously borrowed and repaid 6 loans from NWTF. She aspires to build and expand her business to secure her family's future.

loans.use: to buy additional items such as seasonings, canned goods, detergent, soap, shampoo, soft drinks, noodles, etc. to sell

loans.name: Lun

texts.en: Lun is living in the Samrong Torng district of Kampong Speu province. She is a 30-year-old married woman with two young children. Her children are four and two years old. Lun has been farming for years in order to survive. On average she only earns 18,300 KHR per day to feed her two children. Lun has been a borrower of Kiva’s partner VisionFund for three cycles already; this is her fourth microloan. She is now seeking a loan of 1,000,000 KHR. With the loan money she plans to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farming business. She optimistically hopes that the loan will enable her to live in a better condition and to provide her children with enough food and proper clothes.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds.

location.town: Kampong Speu province, Samrong Torng district

loans.name: Youn

texts.en:
Youn is aged 44 years, and married with a 14-year-old daughter. She lives in a rural village of Battambang province’s Kos Krolo district. In order to support her family, she and her husband earn a living through farming rice which they have been doing for 10 years.
